One needs to frequently clean it for the scanner to work properly. I would have given this phone 5/5 but for the fingerprint scanner I am giving 4.5. Highly recommended.

name: k a swamy
title: shame samsung m31
content: I bought Samsung m31 three months back, it performed smoothly, but since 3 days most of the time am not able to open the phone and not able to answer the cal..some times displaying black screen and its ofen hanging..I checked most of the reviews and I bought this mobile and am regretted..I wili not buy any Samsung mobile in future..I bought it for 17500rs...I wil go Samsung service centre..but this is my last Samsung mobile..anybody want to buy Samsung mobile plz think twice...

name: Satyarth Gupta
title: everything under 16499
content: battery:- really a monster little bit slow charge they should give at least 25w charger but okay in thus price range. camera:-no comparison with the competitive other phones this phone is true winner. weight distribution:- samsung is samarter day by day weight of phone nthng if u see from battery side. Display:-samoled is a real winner this is way better than tft panel or lcd it provides a very smooth user experience to u really appreciable. UI:-ui 1 i like customised ui of this phone personally i love stock android but this on is really gud i enjoyed it they give us a numerous option to customise the phone according to ur comforabiltiy. processor:- is gud enough fo day to day use they may give udated but its okay. finishing of back panel from side is sexiest thing of this i love the way they finished its sides riund types feel when u hold it in ur hands

name: Rajarshi Ghosh
title: Value for money
content: One of the best phones by Samsung that is value for money and gives the user more than enough resources to enjoy the smartphone. It is a great gift for elderly parents as they don't want to deal with the hassle of ads on Xiaomi & other Chinese phones.. The standouts are the camera and the battery life including the simplicity of the OS. I highly recommend this smartphone at this price point.

name: aravind
title: Decent phone for the price.
content: The camera and display are excellent. I am absolutely fine using a regular fingerprint reader , as midrange indisplay fingerprint reader sucks in midrange samsung phones.. Battery life is decent, you csn leave a lot of things turned on.. The phone takes a lot of time to boot up , not sure why.. Charging is pretty slow compared other quick charging Samsung phones.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Unintended advertisement and Apps
content: I think Samsung is not only selling its mobile but also selling the Apps. This mobile comes with preinstall a large number of waste apps. This mobile will show you the notification to update and after updating it will install some unwanted Apps that is very irritating. It will also show you continuously advertisement. Of course, these advertisement and apps from back end is stilling your data and information. The worst part is that some of unwanted gaming and other app you cannot delete, otherwise you may lose your warranty.. I will never suggest a mobile and a company that have their hidden agenda and want to cheat the customer some way or other.. Even though it comes with 4 GB ram, you consider it only 2 GB ram because the remaining 2 GB is reserved for the unwanted Apps and the same with the processor.. That is the reason this mobile is having the problem of frequent hang and not responding in the crucial time. .

name: nischal
title: 3 days usage - Value for money
content: 3 days used. Battery performance beyond par. Display is Amazing. Camera performance is below average. CPU yet to be tested. UI is smooth. Built quality is decent liked it. Will update review after more usage

name: prabhu
title: Value for money
content: Great phone for this price. I went for the 8/128 GB variant. Though a big fan of the Mi phones I switched to Samsung for a change and was definitely not disappointed.. For someone who looks at performance/battery life with an awesome screen this phone will check all the boxes.. If you are very particular about looks, light weight, extremely fast charging, great camera then don't go for this phone.

name: sanjeev
title: not upto the mark
content: camera is bad as compared to redmi. No good features. No AI features. Taking screenshot with 3 finger swipe is not possible. Good battery life. Finger print reader is slow.. The phone is slow. You type something in the search of settings bar, it takes 3/4 seconds to respond. Not at all expected such from samsung in this price range with 6GB/128GB.. It seems, the product is released in a hurry to compete with other company products in market, but the features are not incorporated.. No wonder xiomi/redmi is the top brand / choice for people in India. I got this samsung with exchange of redmi phone, but this phone has got less features as compared to the old redmi phone.. If features are not as per market standard, Samsung will become Nokia one day.

name: santosh hegde
title: Awesome smartphone
content: The best ever decision qas to purchase this budget Smart phone with extraordinary battery capacity.. I have never expected the amazing Performance of Samsung phones of this price range.. The performance of this phone is ultimate matching near to its S series phones.. Battery is awesome...its range for me is 18hrs in one charge.. Camera performance is out standing.. Fingerprint is instant.. Overall best offer by Samsung.. Thanks to Samsung for launching such a wonderful budget Smart phone.

name: Anubhav Pandit
title: Great phone in this Budget. 👌
content: The phone is really good for this budget, I was looking for a secondary phone since a long time and after using it , I will never use the term secondary with this. It's a amazing phone to use , I have been using it since 3 weeks.. It takes time to charge but the battery lasts for 2 days (6000 mh).. Picture quality is more than enough 64 mega pixel and 32 selfie shooter gives you perfect experience of photography.. Face unlocking is a bit slow but good enough.. Finger print reader is nice.. Over all looks is 9.5 out of 10. Great phone Samsung.. Got the delivery of the phone in just 2 days , much appreciated . Amazon 👍

name: Vinoth
title: Best Phone for budget money (after 4 months usage)
content: Earlier, i bought M30s for my family members and i used the same few months. I haven't satisfied on mobile phone performance and camera. During that time, came to know, the launch of M31 in the market. Gone through the specification and booked on the release day itself .. The over all performance fare better than M30s due to 6 GB RAM.. The camera quality is very much better.. The battery life is very good.. Worth to buy this money

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not Good
content: I am writing this review after using of one and half month, this mobile might be having sofware problem and all app's are not working properly and always buffering and i have my old mobile redmi note 4 this is working fine, but this new samsung M31 mobile is having issue, if i open app's like amazon and flipkart it is still showing old offers and not today's and if i add some items it is showing different price while displaying and when i go to click on buy that time different price and internet also too slow in this mobile like 2G or 3G maximum and also too much of eating problem, if i use for 10 mins of internet it will become too hot and for camera also if i use for 5 minutes too much hot, totally i have worst experience with this mobile and don't know others given over all 4 + star rating, if they take it back i will return as of now amazon closed the return date for me before experiencing uisng of this mobile.

name: Priyanka
title: In this price range you may go with other options ...
content: After using one month ..These are good things I noticed..1. touch is good 2. Battery is good.. 3.screen is perfect . Now comes to bad points..1.some time screen got blackout automatically not expected this.. 2. in simple application it get hang some time(i am not pubg player dont know what they are racing). 3. Camera is okk okk i hv vivo with same specifications ..As it is camera phone still it lags with vivo...

name: Najih1
title: Good phone for all rounder.
content: Its battery life is really amazing. I charged this phone from 0 to 100 in 160 mins. If you are heavy social media user you can use continously 10hrs with one full charge.. Pros:. Good wide angle camera. Best selfie. Great features like app timer and you can see how much you spended time in each day.. It can be suitable fir even 13 years child too with parental control.. Good display quality. Fast responding with no hangs. All rounder.. It owned its samsung exynos 9116 soc processer. Which prevent from loss of performance when heating. Cons:. Dust on phone will easily visible. Design is lightly old. Samsung still remains the launcher no improvement in launcher.. Charging time is little slow when compared to redmi latest phones

name: Charan N.
title: upper part is very hot.
content: I felt myself very bad for switching back to Samsung. It is having all good quality as they mention in specifications. But I can't imagine why it is generating that much of heat at upper half part of mobile. Very scary even to touch. Hope it will be solved in future with some system upgradation. Waiting for the same. - Charan

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not a worthy phone as hyped.
content: This phone is not a good one as being hyped by promoters. I have no star for this phone but I am forced to give one star because I cannot submit the comments without it.. 1. 4G Phone: Technically this phone is not 4G, but nearing LTE. Other LTE phones work better than this one.. 2. 6000mah Battery: If samsung do not provide 6000mah battery, with the exynos 9611 processor, it will not last even for one day. Currently have no apps installed but just two sims and nothing else. Do you know, it only lasts for 35hours only in stand by mode. It is a false promise by Samsung. I thought this is a issue with my phone and contacted the helpdesk, they did few tests from my phone and installed a diagnostic tool and it said all good, so I came to a conclusion that all M31 phones have similar issue.. 2. Camera Quality: Though it has 64MP quad rear camera, i would say it could say the resoulution is not better than a normal 16MP camera. Though it says in the SAMSUNG Portal support site that by default it is 16MP but can be changed. So, in reality, it is only 16MP not better than that.. 3. Processor Performance: There is a lag when we swipe or scroll up or down. Not good. I think, Exynos 9611 can perform only to that extent. Obviously, it is no way near Snapdragan or no better than Helios MediaTek processors.. 4. OS: Samsung customized Android version10 OS. Samsung has made the GUI ugly and not a well planned OS Interface.. 5. Advertisements: People who wish not to be popped up with unecessary Ads and stupid stufs, please dont go for Samsung. I think Realme is much better when compared to OS GUI and ad free Mobile OS.. The only Pro I can think off this phone is its clarity, because it has 409p density. In general, it is not a good deal when compared to REALME 6/7 series phones

name: kasulu
title: Believer of Samsung is like believe ourself
content: Working of Samsung Galaxy M31 mobile is excellent.. Samsung was given the super display at the least price, no other mobile on this will not give this type of display.. Brand at reasonable price.. Smooth functioning.. Largest buying product on Amazon history in mobiles.. Coming to camera quality. Samsung is brand in terms of camera. If you want to check camera features other phones like MI top brands also uses Samsung cameras.. Processer of this mobile was good, it could be designed such a way that it can be operated in lower network area also.. In my area lots of network issues, at that time also this SAMSUNG GALAXY M31 give 6Mbps speed, any other Mobile's of my friends network speed wasn't give more than 300Kbps. Fingerprint reader is also good.. I don't know how many years battery will work, but this is not fast charging, this one is only drawback of this phone.. A separate pouche and glass is required, they won't provide them along with mobile.. Hearpones also not provided along with mobile.. Above mentioned all(headphones, glass and pouch) are not related to product working, they're other things.. I want to tell one thing to Amazon is that. If return amount is small value you could directly return to Amazon pay balance,. But if it is high amount you could deposit it into bank account not to Amazon pay balance. I rised this issue because I am facing problem(rude behavior of Amazon) from last 4months. Because we are students, we're not earning money, if we earn money this is not a problem.. These are all related to Amazon.. But product is good.

name: Anand Phadnis
title: Samsung Galaxy M31 review post 2 months usage
content: Samsung Galaxy M31, A brilliant product by Samsung! This phone just grabs attention.... The Camera quality is superb as I have seen till now, the 64 Megapixel camera just excels. The quad camera does it job in a very useful manner, 64 MP main camera has a f1.8 aperture, 5 mp depth camera has a f 2.2 aperture, 5 mp macro camera has f 2.4 aperture and the last one 8 mp 123° Ultrawide camera has f 2.2 aperture. Each camera excells in it's own way, the 5mp camera focuses on the depth ina very keen manner , 5mp macro camera focuses on every object that is too close in a matter of 3-5 cm distance, 8mp 123° Ultrawide camera brilliantly captures all those scenarios which you wish to have it in your phone.. Video quality is so Good that it feels like you are a photo-video maker. The super steady video feature helps in video making, and it will be usefull if you are a vlogger.. Talking about the screen, the 6.4" inch sAMOLED FHD(Full HD) + infinity U display will give you a attention grabbing feel.. Battery performance is so good that you can use it a whole day! I get a total 21 hours of backup time Including Internet, Music, Video all combined together.. Talking about the processor it just excels in this performance, the 6GB ram 2.3 GHz quadcore processor will help improve gaming experience along with AI game booster.. Charging capacity has been Increased with 15W Fast charging within no time you can charge your phone!. Overall I liked this phone very much and I recommend you to go ahead without giving a second chance.

name: Suprav M.
title: Important things to know after 3 months .
content: Let me discuss about the good things that I found in this phone that is Samsung M31 after using it for more than 3 months. The camera quality is really nice and after the update I can use manual camera using shutters iso and other features that I get with high end phones. The display quality is really really nice as expected from AMOLED screens. And the battery backup is also nice it can give you have you around 8 hours of screen on time. And after using it for a long time I think that the best thing of this phone is the UI and the one UI is really really useful and very handy. Now let's come to the bad things that I don't like about this phone. And the first thing that comes in mind is the fingerprint reader and it is very horrible fingerprint I don't know the generation of this fingerprint reader if your fingers are a bit of sweat and it will not recognise your finger and I get very angry most of the time(it recognises yourfingers 2/5). Frankly speaking the fingerprint is the worst thing in this phone. The charging speed is a bit of slow but in m31 as it has been improved. Will this is my review of the Samsung Galaxy m31. I have given it a rating of 4 in 5 and 8 out of 10. And I have got the marks in four out of five because of the fingerprint scanner and 8 out of 10 because of fingerprint scanner and the charging speed other than that I am heavy user and I don't use the phone for heavy gaming I think that for daily use it is a very very nice phones and the features of one UI is really nice.

name: Ashish Malkar
title: The best phone at this price range!!
content: After using the phone for about 20 days here's my detailed review on Samsung Galaxy M31.. Display - 5 on 5 (Super Amoled Display of 6.4 inch is absolutely stunning. It is really good at this price point). Camera - 4.5 on 5 (Quad Cam setup at the back produces nice daytime images, in nights the images tend to loose a bit of the quality, but that's okay at this price). Battery - 5 on 5 (It's monster battery really lasts long even with heavy usage, It lasts some 2 days for me on a full charge. It takes some 2 and half hours to charge this monster battery, this should have been supported with a 25V fast charger). Body - 3.5 on 5 (Look and feel of the phone is quite premium, though nothing special in it. The glossy back lets the phone down as the back is quite slippery and prone to scratches and finger prints. Must buy a good back cover to protect the phone from slipping from hand). Performance - 4.5 on 5 (The phone is quite good in performance as the UI is very smooth and there are no noticeable lags while using it. I have some 70-80 apps on the phone and the phone runs smoothly. With graphics intense gaming such as Asphalt or NFS No limits phone tends to heat a little bit.). Is it worth buying? Absolutely yes... Given the features at this price point this phone is absolutely worth the every penny.. However if you have a little extra budget, would advice to go for Galaxy M31s.. Thank you,. Ashish Malkar

name: Bhargav K
title: Nice option for ppl who prefer Samsung brand.
content: This review is after 5 months of usage. So hope it is helpful to make your purchase decision easier.. Pros:. 1. Camera quality is really good. Has multiple inbuilt options to click quality pictures.. 2. 6 GB RAM lives upto its speed, multitasking is quite easy without any lag.. Cons:. 1. There is a heating issue near the speaker when we are on long call or while playing games for more than 1/2 hr.. 2. Unfortunately the finger print sensor is not upto the mark and requires multiple touches at times.

name: Nishith Gupte
title: Overall a Good phone
content: Pretty heavy phone to handle.. great response time from one window to another, excellent refresh rate on the screen.. Didn’t like was too much heating on the phone. May becoz of the 6000 mah battery at the back but it’s ok as most of phone do heat up.. Battery life is something on how the person uses it, it’s recommended that use the phone till it indicates it needs to be charged say 15% or even 5%. And then charge the phone back again. To have healthy battery life.

name: Aditya
title: REALLY GOOD BUDGET PHONE
content: It has been 12 days since I got my phone. The switching from old phone to new phone was super easy with Samsung switch app.. The fingerprint sensor is very sensitive.. The battery life is satisfying. Even when I was gaming slightly (about an hour a day), the battery lasted one whole day. Charging the battery from 15% to 100% takes almost 2 hours. That was a bit disappointing.. Camera is good. The colors come out well. There are many features in the camera - single take, which captures many frames together and makes a movie out it and hyperlapse etc... Image quality is not great. When I zoom into images, the images are grainy. Check the attached image of a leaf.. 128GB storage will be useful since Google is limiting the free storage for original photos.. I have already done drop twice, accidentally and all is well. (The phone has a cheap case though).. The ocean blue color is elegant. I love it... Phone is pretty light for its size. The length is almost 15cm and fills my hand (my hand is 18 cm from base to tip of the longest finger). I find it slightly difficult to handle it with one hand. But, I like the big screen for reading novels.. There are many built-in options that I like - focus mode which temporarily blocks certain apps of your choice from showing notifications and the apps are not accessible by you in that mode. It has helped me reduced my itch to check phone every now and then.. Verdict:. REALLY GOOD BUDGET PHONE.

name: RAJU BABU SAKALI
title: A wounderful phone to meet my purse
content: On the next day of release i.e 6.3.2020 , I purchased Samsung M31 , as I was very impressed with M20.Samsung the " master in creating mobiles " in the intrest of public and to their taste.. My order was honoured and sent the phone within 3days.Now Iam enjoying the great phone suitable to my purse.. No heating in playing and recording videos.Thrillig sound output ..What more I need..I recommend to my friends to own a beautiful phone..

name: Arun NT
title: Absolutely worthy
content: Amazing phone. I was hesitant to go for m31 initially and was looking for m51 due to the snapdragon processor - however I think m31 is doing real good. Incase you are someone who changes a phone once in 2.5 - 3 yrs, I would suggest you pick an 8gb RAM. I see that mostly 5 gb of RAM is consumed and we better be future proof , atleast for a 3 yr horixon. A 9611 processor with 8gb RAM should be abld to handle processing capacity required til 2023. Battery full charge to 10% discharge took 38 hrs twice - including few hrs of video watching, chrome usage, extensive calls in Google Meet and Teams, hours of dealhunt in Amazon and Flipkart etc.

name: Surendra Khandelwal
title: Basically best in this price range!!
content: First of all let me start with why it’s called m31 bcoz it’s Mega than any other same range phones as it has a 6.4 inch sAmoled display which is quite good in this range then talking about the major thing about it which is it’s battery life which is stunning as it goes for like 20 hrs non-stop as I charged it to 100% and used it for the whole day and its commendable as I also bought redmi note 9 pro max with 5020 mAh battery and it ran for 16 hrs from fully charged but it was way heavier than this and also not so easy to carry but then again this phone is quite good to facilitate your daily needs. Talking about the camera, it’s quite good although the night mode can get better but it’s still okay considering such type of product in such low price. The only limitation was the speakers as talking about samsung’s product it could have been better but to cover it up they are providing dolby atmos so it actually makes it up. Now about the game performance, oh it’s superb and quite good and maybe best in such price range as it has its own processor which is quite good I think and it comes in the 6gb and 8gb variant so depending on your needs. Talking about the fingerprint sensors, it’s fast and easy to use as it’s on the back but at day I use face unlock as it’s more handy and also fast. And it’s basically best for binge watching and gaming. All in all, in nutshell, I would say that it’s the best phone currently in such price range so you can buy it for sure.

name: Sunil Pednekar
title: Samsung has really lived up to my expectations!!!
content: I am fully satisfied, as of now!. This Phone meets all my requirements to the fullest.. Batter gives me 2 days backup 👍. Camara is awesome, more than I need. Still exploring the features of camara, so much to do for a YouTuber 👍. The Biometric "Fingerprint Reader" is very sensitive and better than the previous phone, picks up instantly. 👍. It's a new launch & I was worried when I bought.. Value for the price of the product.. Samsung has really lived up to my expectations!!!

name: Kamal Parmar
title: Best phone to buy under 18k hands down.. but keep two things in mind!
content: Everything about this phone is too good like the sAmoled display and the battery. I'd give 5 stars to everything about this phone EXCEPT:. 1) Audio Output( 3/5 ): We'll, unless you're a musician( like me)or a sound engineer you wouldn't really notice the difference.. but if you listen to music a lot then it'll take a while getting used to this sound.. it isn't bad but it sounds a bit too stereo.. keep that in mind before buying this phone. 2)Camera( 3/5 ): your images will be sharp but when you zoom In, the picture gets all smudgy. Also the ultrawide images have average quality and so does the night mode. But for this price range.. there's nothing more you can expect because I have compared Samsung's camera with realme and Samsung's 48Mp is better than Realme's 64Mp. Overall this is a solid phone but just keep those two things in mind before buying it.. this is the best you can get for this price range.. and the audio and camera aren't bad, but they might not come close to your high expectations.. Also, one thing I wanted to mention is, this is my first Samsung phone and I love it.. the company has a fantastic aftersale support team and you have an app for community of Samsung users where you can share your greivences and discuss stuff with other users and the company itself. I love it! This is the best phone I've had and I couldn't ask for more!

name: Amazon Customer
title: GO FOR IT WITHOUT ANY SECOND THOUGHT
content: Phone built quality is good. It's a very rigid phone. I have already dropped it thrice but thank God phone is working normal till now.. Camera quality is AWESOME. It is best in this price range. But camera is not so quick. Phone gives lag while using camera.. Battery life is normal if we see a 6000 MAh battery. My usage is mostly internet and I use Bluetooth connection also. I get around 8 to 10 hours of battery life when Bluetooth and location is on.. Finger print sensor is working fine. But I think it could be a faster one.. Phone is not so quick while using multiple windows. It gives lag.. Overall I am fully satisfied with the phone performance. Highly recommended if you are searching a new phone in this price range. GO FOR IT WITHOUT ANY SECOND THOUGHT.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good for the price, but not for the specifications
content: Battery life and RAM performance is very good, but the USP - 64MP main camera and other 3 cameras do not perform to the specifications. No portrait mode so no 3D photos on FB. Even the 64MP main camera fails to capture details and objects blur on zooming in - not at all expected. Macro camera does some good work, but not able to capture details required for a macro photo. Wide angle camera and live focus are just good enough. Night mode is not so impressive. Overall, average camera gives average rating for the otherwise good phone.

name: Nikhil
title: Failed model
content: Used the phone for 5 months, was good, a bit bulky, used to get heated a bit while using cam and mobile data. After 5 months it started randomly restarting when switching apps, which gradually increased to restarting while using any app for long, and eventually could only use it to accept calls. Went to service centre, they said motherboard problem, and said they'd replace the motherboard but not the whole phone, after a few weeks(due to covid) they said cant be repaired and that theyll give vouchers amounting to 15k or so, to use in Samsung stores -_-. Even the samsung store people have told that they have been receiving lots of complaints regarding m31. So, heads up if you're gonna buy.

name: Jithesh Nadesan
title: M31 Best value for money
content: M31 the best at this price. Best value for money. I was using galaxy note 8. And unfortunately i had to cut down my budget temporarily. So i picked this one just for the time being. Honestly saying i never compromise in quality thats why i always bought too model phones. But this time i am very happy because i did not have to compromise in quality even though i picked this cheaper one. I am not going to through this for bagging the top model. I am satisfied by its performance. I bought this on 25th of May. And its perfectly working so far. I recommend M31 rather than other chinese fancy phones with less price n more futures. There is no comparison for samsung quality. I use samsung' phones since last 9 years.. And like always Amazon is the best in services n deliveries. That is why i am registered with amazon for so many years

name: Sirisha
title: Good
content: I have been loyal Samsung user for years now. This one works smooth but trying to get used to its screen length. Camera works fine. I haven't noticed any difference between normal cam mode and 64mp mode, but both are fine. Macro lens version is to be simply admired. Slow motion works well too. Overall it's a good phone. I am satisfied.

name: Madhav
title: Power House with Awesome Display
content: Pros and Cons compare to other mobiles in the same budget. Pros.. 1. Awesome Display. 2. Battery Excellent. 3. Build quality is OK. 4. Camera (both front and back) is good ( not comparing with flagship mobile cams ). 5. Speaker sound quality is decent. 6. One UI is OK but it could have been better. 7. Processor is good and with 6GB RAM it's performance is smooth. Cons.. 1. No back cover out of the box.. 2. 15w charger is enough for 6000mah battery. 3. Camera (both front and back) in low light is not up to the mark. 4. There are few issue with software for example, sometimes unable to send SMS, Samsung customer took remote access but unable to find reason.. hope these software issues will be fixed soon with future updates. Over all - it is a value for money.

name: Rushikesh Anil Jagtap
title: Best budget smartphone!
content: One of the best smartphone in budget, All the picture I've posted are non edited.. Low light is quite good, Was playing pubg for almost 3 hours still the phone doesn't heat much.. Battery backup - Monster 6000mah Massive.. My use is very rough, fell from 1st floor with hard cover but still no scratches on screen or damage.. Quite good processor.

name: Nirupam
title: Not recommended if in low signal area
content: Got it atv12400 after discount and cashback. Bought in Oct 2020 and using for almost 6 months. I had overlooked reviews talking about signal issues as I live in metro with good signal coverage.. But this phone doesn't serve the basic purpose of calling when signal strngth is low. Otherwise it's a decent phone at this price. I am not a gamer so can't tell about that.. =======================. Detailed review. CONS. 1. Poor signal reception and call quality in low signal areas. Cheap feature phones are better in this regard.. 2. Less 4G speed in high signal areas also. 3. Heating issue when using speaker. 4. Dual apps supported only for messaging apps. Cheaper Redmi phones support this.. PROS. 1. Great UI. 2. Frequent and stable updates. 3. Good camera at this price point of 12.4K.. 4. Excellent display. 5. Wifi 5ghz giving great speed. 6. Wifi calling available. Can solve signal issues to some extent if supportedby your carrier.. 7. Average 9hrs SOT on normal usage giving about 1.5 days battery life. 8. Excellent display and viewing angles. 9. Good RAM management. Keeps apps in memory for quite a lot of time. Haven't faced any hang issue till now. Have around 40 tabs in chrome, hotstar Netflix etc.

name: Shashank
title: Amazing phone if you look for performance over camera.
content: Writing this review after using it for 3 months now. Overall a great buy in this price range, i purchased 64GB model for rs 15999. Amazingly fast touch, display is really good with true colors, slim & light phone, good shape easy to have a good grip, battery pife is amazing lasts almost for 2 days even if i decently use it, really fast charging, camera is not very good if you conpare it to other phones like redmi or oppo of this range,night vision camera is almost of no use, still camera is ok ok, fingureprint sensor not very fast and good but works fine, good speaker sound, fast operating .

name: SARAT CHANDRA SAHOO
title: Quality product of Samsung
content: Quality and a class product with many new and advance features. As I got this product on 15th Aug, I experienced the accuracy of Battery life with 6000 mah. But I can adjudge the quality of battery and it's durability after use of some more days. Till now I am fully satisfied with the product. I can advise whosoever is reading my review may decide this phone m31 without any confusion as this is latest with quality display, voice with advance features.

name: Ritesh Singh
title: Sim tray trolley found tilt ( sim insert)
content: Very bad Experience. Too much costly mobile set, when we have done mobile in ON and working condition, We have found Sim tray trolley in tilt ( sim insert) condition.. As a consumer we will purcahse costly Mobile set, I think it will be cheated me by Samsung /AMAZON , so what we will do , because we will try AMAZON to replace the set , but not help from AMAZON side.. Please help or send me Sim tray trolley (my address). Not happy with product quality (problem sort out as soon as possible). Regards. Ritesh

name: G
title: Plastic body, heavy, finger reader just dont work
content: The phone's not all bad, but yeah i expected a metal body. The phone overall look good, but the plastic used at the backside look cheap and doesnt fit properly around finger scanner. The camera is hyped, its actually not that great, more no. of cameras doesnt make a better picture for sure. I laughed way too hard when i zoomed my pictures, they dont blur they just convert into photoshopped beautified pictures. The depth in the pic is definitely missing, so ya not a great cam. No headphones, i mean this is just becoming a trend lately, but not acceptable. Also, what has happened to the usb cable length, i wonder how much does Samsung save on that. Simply Disappointed.. I wish i could return the phone.. After a month of usage, the finger reader just doesn't work properly. SAMSUNG you guys really need to test ur devices before flooding the mkt with new phones every next month.

name: Dr Dileep kumar singh
title: Monster Phone in Prize Segment
content: 1. I'm writing this review after 120 days of usage, using the 6GB Ram /128GB version.. 2. PROS.. (a) A great delivery experience by Amazon - within 72hr delivery.. (b) The phone is sleek & stylish to look at.. (c) Battery backup(6000MAh) is just awesome. For an average user like me, it lasted for two days in a single full charge.. (d) Very very smooth processor, as compared to other phones in this price range like Oppo, realms and Mi. Works like a flash.. (e) Brand value of Samsung at this price with the latest specs.. (f) With quad camera & a 64MP main camera, pretty amazing photos are clicked. The low light camera is particularly helpful. Front camera is average.. (g) If you are a fan of AMOLED display, this is the phone for you.. (h) No problem of overheating while usage or charging.. 4. CONS.. (a) With a 15W charger, it is charging slow taking approx 3hrs for a full charge, especially when compared to VOOC charger.. (b) Not a very rugged phone, you might need to use a back cover from Day 1.. (c) Finger touch has less sensitivity.. 5. Otherwise I'm satisfied with the phone & the experience it provides. Overall, I would totally recommend to go for Samsung Galaxy M31, as at this price with the specs & brand value of Samsung, this is the best buy. 👍

name: Amazon Customer
title: Perfect All-rounder
content: Pros: Excellent battery and camera. Very well optimized UI. Very good gaming device. Screen quality is excellent. Made in India.. Cons: Heating issues on prolonged usage. Face unlock sometimes unresponsive. Front camera even at 32 MP seems grainy. Plastic body a bit smooth and flimsy. Charging time is around 2.5 hrs from 30 to 100 and heats up slot while charging. Very few issues overall, I am being very specific here.. Overall a great buy. Would recommend to people who are on the move and need their phone all day long .

name: Pratik Dholakia
title: mobile heating up too much and poor amazon service
content: Only within 3 to 4 days I came know that mobile is over heating during normal video conferencing. I urges Amazon to take it back and give refund but they refused. They scheduled an appointment for mobile check. no one came to check the mobile as scheduled before. The rescheduling was done 3 times but all times no one came. I am so frustrated not only by poor quality of samsung phone but also the poor service by AMAZON. I urge everyone to STAY AWAY FROM THIS PARTICULAR SAMSUNG MOBILE MODEL and STAY AWAY FROM AMAZON AS WELL DUE TO THEIR EXTREME POOR SERVICE.

name: Mt
title: VFM phone with excellent camera and battery backup
content: Camera quality is very good when using the 64MP setting. Battery life is good, a full charge lasts for a little more than 2 days. Screen resolution quite crisp. Value for money. Was worried about chipset being exynos and not qualcom, but can't recognise any difference in performance for my usage till now as compared to my previous phone which had a qualcom set 7 series set. This is after 3 weeks of usage.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worst phone
content: One of the worst phone. Defective display. Had to spend additional 6000rs within 1month of purchase at Samsung authorised service centre in Kolkata. After repairing again touchpad was not working within 3wks and they asked for additional 6k rs again. Warranty and all r a farce, nothing comes in warranty though being in warranty period. Would have given a minus review. Horrible customer care and support services, absolute wastage of money.

name: Sujal
title: Some improvements needed in next update❤ please samsung
content: First of all after 1 month of using m31, i am now going to post a review about it.. so let's start with the following. Screen-first of all if you are a movie lover or watch movies mostly on mobile then its samoled has no comparison and is best in all cotegories.. Battery- optimization of battery is not so good, but yeah you can play pubg continuous for almost 7-8 hrs which is quite impressive.. now you can think of urself how good is its battery. Processor-its processor is quite good, but but but optimization of it is worst, 9611 is quite gud, if it may be optimized well..with the software and games... You can get fps around 35-55 in pubg smooth +extreme. Body-body is made of plastic, and no frame but yaa with a cover it look amazing🖤. Weight- with a massive 6000mah battery weight of the phone is well managed not so heavy, not so light, normal normal but yaa more than normal devices. Last but not the least. Advice-download Package disabler pro and disable all bloatware.. it will make your device more smooth.... I guess in the next update they will optimize the processor and fix there services bugs... Stay safe❤

name: Yashaswi Naik
title: I would recommend it
content: After 1 month of using this phone I'm writing this review. Battery life is really good, fingerprint reader could have been better, it fails to scan fingerprint sometimes. Picture quality looks decent but I don't think it's 64mp camera. Takes 2-2.5 hours to charge phone fully. I just love the display. Low light camera performance is weak. So far no problem with performance.. I would recommend Samsung m31 if you like this brand but there are better ones for this price in the market ( mostly made in china goods). Pros -. good battery life. decent performance. decent camera ( day light). Cons -. No fast charging. Bad low light photography. Video quality is not up to the mark. Phone is slippery ( I wouldn't recommend using this phone without phone case). Overall I'm happy with the purchase.. got it for 15499Rs

name: Kiran kumar g v
title: Dont go for it, go for higher version
content: After 3 days used, accidentally dropped in water and removed immediately, but mobile hanging problem occurred even for a very little time in water.. visited Samsung service center, they told to replace the mother board which costs me around 9800/- part itself.. so finally the mobile kept as a toy to my children and booked another mobile.. Worst product experience ever.

name: Harsh Dixit
title: Worth a buy
content: Very best product at this range. Battery and camera is awesome. Network connectivity is not as strong as M30 but it could be better with some updates. Design and build is awesome and also glass is strong I dropped 3 4 times but its totally fine. I would recommend to provide some updates for network stability rest everything is awesome.

name: Amrendra Kr
title: Superb, Value for Money, Samsung Brand & Made in India
content: Quality product, excellent speed, battery life of 48 hrs with long usage for gaming videos etc. Best packed product at this price with 8GB Ram/128 GB memory. Samsung Brand Indian manufacturing make it unbeatable.. Most honest priced product at this specification by Samsung in M series. Done lot of comparison with A70s/ A71 but find this better in all aspect.

name: Krishna Chaitanya
title: Awsome mobile with WoW price
content: Very good handset in the budget of 17k that to from a brand like Samsung. i was using Galaxy A7 before to this mobile and other than thickness and few features like on-screen notifications and PIP features are missing. But Battery performance wise \ camera & Display wise makes this mobile on upper hand side.. for thoose who are camera lovers and brand freakers can choose this mobile without any worries.

name: vishal verma
title: Okay
content: Right product in right cost..Samsung improving with quality in its low cost model also. However, Samsung need to work out for the authenticity of front camera quality declarement. Quality not upto mark at artificial light. 48 mega picture..its just a figure..not matching expectations.. But it capture actual colours..thats very nice.. Night shots are amazing really...appreciated.. Body is slim..comfortable for holding in hands while doing chat..📱.. Amazon given best service to its delivery commitment. Second Next day phone arrived in my hand. Super..I was needing this badly. Thanks to amazon. One more thing, phone take lot of time for charging..take care Samsung

name: Santiram Karmakar
title: Good Smartphone Samsung M31
content: After using almost a month my review of Samsung M31.... I was not fan of Samsung smart phones. I have been using some other brand for last 6 yrs. And my last phone is still continuing...as I could not book desired model of that brand I switched to Samsung with almost same spec and price.. Pros:. 1. Camera : Camera is good.. 2. OS : Latest Android...Looks good.... 3. Battery backup is best.. 4. Charging adapter is really fast.. 5. Display is nice.... 6. Space is a lot... memory card is not necessary... of course a backup space is fine to keep.. 7. No hybrid slot...so...two sim and memory card is easy to install.. 8. Battery saving mode is available that can give a longer battery life...good while travelling.... Cons:. 1. Speraker : Sound quality is not good. Even call sound seems littled distorted.. 2. Default Message App - I needed to change this.. 3. Sensor that control screen light during call needed some upgradation...it does not work always.... 4. Missing default app that displays CPU and resource usage. 5. Missing metal back.... Overall experience is good for this phone...

name: Kalpana rangra
title: Heating quickly
content: I jss received the product in morning.i am using it to check features and i found two major issues.its heating very quickly.and secondly there is lag in sound and video while making watsapp and duo calls. have a30 that is performing better.if there is any possible solution to this.camera quality is ok in daylight.it took exactly 2.5 hrs to charge.i may be too quick to review so I am going to observe the device for two more days.lets see.. After two days i am satisfied with battery performance and the display is indeed wonderful.face unlock is slow.. All i need now is tempered though its not required but i am to clumsy in handling mobiles.sombody please suggest the one that shouldn't affect the feel of screen.. Overall its ok for daily use nothing like awsmm but its good.

name: Afreen
title: Not satisfied
content: Just bought this M31 on sale its been couple of days n I am seeing while browsing Amazon the screen is flickering and showing vertical lines instead of products. This problem is coming while browsing any image online. This never happened wd me earlier on my redmi phones. Something is wrong in this phone's hardware or software this can't be internet. Wondering if I should return.

name: Shivam Goel
title: Awesomeness in every sense!!
content: The M in the phone really stands for a monster. The battery back up of the phone is awesome. You can easily relly on the phone for 2 days of the battery time. The camera is also very great and gives you exquisite images and videos. And everyone knows screen quality of the samsung is best in the industry. Also, the performance of the phone is really good, in day to day usage the phone is really great and if you use it for gaming I bet you won't regret it.

name: Bn
title: Excellent, Bank for the Buck!!!
content: This fingerprint reader is faster then my last mobile, and much more fast then in screen fingerpring.. The camara quality is good, and took nice portrait shorts.(here I uploaded some pics for m31). And I really like the display and build, although I had 6000 may battery weight distribution is even. Really enjoying 6000mah battery, it gets more then 1 day of Battery life and 10Hrs of ScreenOn time,. Even flagships like S20,note 10, OnePlus, iPhone doesn't get this battery life (they get around 5-7hrs approx). If it gets a fast charger in the box it could be much more easy to charge massive battry. If u are not a power user or a heavy gamer, this is a perfect buy. Mainly elders dont use heavy apps or games, if they use it in battery saver mode, it can easily get 2 days of battery life for them.. Note**. One of the Main reason to buy is Samsung security feature, if Ur cell is lost you track it with Samsung website immediately (if net is on), and "NOBODY CAN SWITCH OFF" your mobile unit they have Ur Password or pattern. I think this review helpful. Thank you.......

name: Amazon Customer
title: Great phone
content: Overall I this phone is a good buy and value for money. It's does everything as described. I would recommend this phone.. PROS.. (a) A great phone, great delivery. Phone looks nice and easy to control.. (b) 🔋 life is good, single charge allows me to work whole day. Which is good.. (c) phone speed is good, I haven't faced any lag in any action.. (d) camera works as expected. Picture quality is amazing.. CONS.. (a) I think front camera can be little better.

name: Raihan Afzal
title: Don't buy- No different that other Chinese brands
content: After 1 year of use.. 1. The phone comes pre installed with a lot of useless apps like facebook, Netflix etc that you won't be able to uninstall. These apps probably collect your data and samsung gets money. They even consume battery.. 2. There are few useless apps that you'll be able to uninstall, but guess what after every update they'll install those apps again. Ex- Byjus, Sharechat etc.. So in short samsung is doing the same things that Chinese brands do. They are no different, don't buy samsung mid rangers. I gave this phone to my mother and she complained me about some 3rd degree apps and notification then I noticed all this. They'll keep pushing you to install the apps they suggest.. Summary - Don't buy samsung mid rangers, worse thans Chinese brands, at least Chinese brands give good hardware by doing the same ad business.

name: neola bianca castelino
title: Amazing monstor Samsung galaxy m31!!!
content: Samsung galaxy m31 touch sensitivity is amazing... feather touch feeling. Camera quality is awesome both rare and front camera. Display is crystal clear and feels great to use the phone. Itseems i am addicted to this phone ever since i got this phone and also have become a photographer, selfies and rear camera pictures quality is great and minor details like colour of the hair, hair strands, pimples, dark circles, colour of pupils etc can be easily observed on zooming a picture taken from this phone. Absolute value for money. Type C charger charges phone in about 2hours. Battery lasts for 2 days with normal usage. Go for it.

name: Aman Kumar
title: Awesome purchase
content: Bought this phone for my father.... But I was so impressed by it that I want to keep it myself 😌. For those who are interested here is my opinion... PROS:-. 1. SAMSUNG... A brand which you can trust blindly... Regular updates... Good after sale services... User data security.... Device durability etc... 2.user interface is nice and simple. 3. Samsung's amoled panel is best as usual. 4. 64mp quad camera is best thing we get in this phone..32 mp selfie camera is cherry on top. 5.very quick fingerprint and face unlock. 6.6000mah battery ... Last almost 2 days with decent usage. 7.powerful processor to fulfill our gaming needs... CONS:-. 1. Providing 15w charger is ok but there should have been atleast support of 25w charging. 2.camera saturation level is bit high and its ui can be better...(these can be fixed with updated). 3. At this price level it should also include case or atleast screen protection film. Final opinion:- one can always find cons in anything no matter how good that thing is.. Believe me you will be fond of this phone once you use it

name: Vinod
title: Camera beast |
content: Awesome device. The One ui is filled with lot of features .The camera and battery 6k mah is best.Camera quality is sharp with better detailing,good dynamic range.Must buy it.Selfie camera Sensor sony (imx616) is great.The 5mp macro shots are better.Built quality is better than m30s.The camera is far far better than any other brand phone in this price.But the back side can be easily scratched so its better to use a case or vinyl.Battery lasts approx 2 days without using internet. Battery lasts 10hour 30 minutes of continuous. gaming, video playback, etc.... Camera: 10/10. Battery: 10/10. Built quality: 9/10. User interface:10/10. Display:10/10. Gaming: 9/10 ( medium level gaming. Better gaming experience in PUBG with medium graphic settings). Pros:. -FHD+ sAMOLED display. -Accurate GPS. -Large 64mp samsung gw1 sensor. - 32 MP Sony imx616 sensor. - 6000mah battery. Cons:. - 15W charger takes long time to charge. _ Glossy polycarbonate body get scratched easily.

name: raghavendra dc
title: With 17k price tag this phone is not a good choice to buy
content: Camera Quality. M30s is far better than M31 I am extremely disappointed.i was expecting better images with f1.8 quality of image is not upto the mark.. Battery life. Again compared to M30 battery life is not good.With average usage battery life is 20 hours.. Audio Quality. Audio volume is too low can't here anything.

name: Vivek Parihar
title: Decent budget Smartphone
content: First of all, this is a china-free smartphone. Samsung produces no smartphone in above mentioned country.. This piece is a value for money product. I am experiencing a monstrous battery life with decent super amoled display.. You will definitively observe a mind boggling viewing experience.. Blue light effect is quite helpful for eyes. And its outstanding camera quality will impress you to the brim.. Last but not least, Brand Value, Samsung always has a reasonable resale value.. Cons:. Speaker output is low. If you are a type of person who doesn't like earphones, and loves to hear songs on speaker, this product might not impress you.. Exynos 9611, though is a decent processor equivalent to Snapdragon 712, but is unsuitable for hardcore gamers. In low graphics, you can observe playable fps.. Charging time is approximately 180-190 minutes from 0-100. Fast charging needs improvement.. Samsung could have provided an earphone, unfortunately, there's none.. Summary:. This is a value for money smartphone which focus is to grab attention of movies and TV show audience. If you go for it, one thing you'll definitely not have is regret.

name: Kislay Singh
title: Very bad
content: A phone with good feature that can't be recommended 🙄. Camera is not upto the mark there are no detials front camera seems to be 8mp rather than 32mp, rear camera ( 64 ) is useless...... Battery performance is not good as shown in the reviews......it doesn't look like i am using a phone with massive battery of 6000mah .This time samsung has disappointed us there are many other phones at this price point I recommend to switch on the other brand rather than wasting your money on this plastic box....

name: Prachi Saxena
title: Buy it without a second thought
content: Samsung galaxy M31 phone is the best phone you can purchase with same amount you can't fine a full package like this in any other phone with same price range . The fingerprint reader is very quick and easy to start same goes with face scanner that is also very quick which I liked very much. And now if we talk about battery life that is also very high it will definitely change your charging habits and what can I say about camera quality it is fantastic .

name: Santhosh J
title: Slow smart phone
content: Phone is very slow because of the custom OS of Samsung, press lock button and it takes half a second to lock the screen, gets hanged too, not worth the price. Battery takes long to charge. Compared to other smartphone in the same price range, it's not worth buying unless you want phone with long battery life and the brand name.

name: Chitranshu Sharma
title: Average phone at this price point. Not happy😕
content: Giving an average review after using for a couple of month.. Pro: got it on a good price with good configuration in the sale.. Cons:. Battery getting drained very fast.. Screen freezes quite a few times and have to reboot many times.. Camera interface is poor and takes time in image processing.. Its an average phone.

name: ashwin
title: Best budget phone
content: I bought this for my friend, best budget phone with extra features, very good battery backup, camera, display and quality , it's is not available in Shops, only thing is it takes 1.5+ hrs to charge, but once you charge 100% then no need to worry, best replacy to Chinese products also, I'm using Redmi phone , but I'm impressed with M31 , before I shifted to Redmi from Samsung because of battery and hanging issues, but now they are back with good phone...

name: Debdeep B
title: Good Phone in this price
content: It's a good phone in this price. However, since the price is low many security features in this phone is compromised like Secure Folder, Samsung Pay, Knox etc. Since the price is low Samsung has taken off many of these features which were even available in the earlier J Series.. Performance: Although this phone comes with 6 GB RAM the performance is good as A Series phones which almost comes in the same price.. Camera: Camera quality is also not that good as A Series phones although M31 comes with 64 MP back and 32MP front camera.. Battery: 6000mAh battery will come for one and half day. If you are looking for 6 GB RAM and 128 GB Storage with better performance, I would rather suggest to go for A51 which will be little higher in price.

name: PH
title: Good Mobile from Samsung at low price.
content: I prefer Samsung than any Chinese brand mobile because I believe it's more reliable and trusted brand.. M31 is having good display, camera is good, and awesome battery backup. Only issue I found with this mobile is it takes a long time to charge about 2 hours, so having 6000mAh is not effective unless you keep it at charge on night (the reason for 4 star).

name: rejathraj
title: Best buy for 16k
content: I have been using this device for more than 2 weeks. I am an above-average user the battery lasts around 40 hrs plus. I am happy with the device.. 1. About the OLED screen: I can adjust the color saturation, I have reduced the color saturation as I am not that used to vivid OLED displays. Brightness is pretty decent one good feature is that we can reduce the brightness to a lower level such that I don't want to install any 'Dark mode' application for night use.. 2. Camera: Camera is pretty good, the wide-angle view is pretty handy when we don't have much space in the room. The front camera is also pretty decent on low light(Recommended).. 3. Weight: It is pretty heavy as it has a massive 6000mah battery. However, the weight is balanced so it is nice to hold on, we won't feel it too heavy when we hold it for a long time.. 4. Performance: Performance is a said as in the paper, I have tried Call of Duty and worked in medium graphics well.. 5.Bluetooth: Bluetooth is important for me as I usually take calls with my Voyager Wireless headphones. Connection time is extremely low . I could turn on my headphone while phone is ringing and the next second the headphone is connected. I used to wait/need to manually connect on my old Zenfone max. So this is a great value add for me. NB: This is not a dedicated gaming phone.. To conclude with this is a very good phone for people who travel a lot and watch movies , surf internet, attend online meetings during their travel. This is not the phone for gamers

name: Raj Dubey
title: Great feature packed phone... Full value for money!!!
content: Wonderful display size and quality, wonderful camera, great speaker, cool battery life. 64 MP Camera works beautifully!. Don't really understand the criticism in other reviews about the phone speaker and other features.... It's a feature packed phone giving full value for money for Rs. 16,000!. Just go for it!. It definitely beats competiting chinese brand phones such as Redmi.

name: BALMUKUND SHUKLA
title: Good Non China Product
content: Pros:. 1. Camera specially Macro. 2. Battery. 3. Display. 4. Wifi Calling. 5. Call recording. 6. Non Chinese. Cons:. 1. Heavy. 2. Thick. 3. Min volume is loud, can't reduce further when required in earbuds. This is a problem in all the latest Samsung phones.. 4. No fast charging just 15W. Overall GOOD, MADE IN INDIA Product

name: Altaf Zain
title: It's arguably  the best phone under this budget. just  go for it
content: I was literally waiting for the Great Indian Festival sale on Amazon ao that I could purchase my favorite phone which I have been eyeing for so long. Starting with the Pros :-. Camera- awesome in this price range especially the new add-on features which were earlier present only in the flagship. Battery - its mammoth , its more than sufficient to give 2 days of screen time.. Display- its super Amoled display and trust me the viewing experience is just fantastic. Binging shows on this screen is a whole new experience.. Let's talk about few Cons -. Gaming performance - its decent performance is capable to run games if run on a moderate graphics level... it gets stuck or lags sometimes when it is good to handle high graphics game.. Overall Review -. It's a fantastic phone and arguably the best phone under this budget , because of the super amazing display , awesome camera, and big battery life... just go for it and trust this trusted global brand !. Rating - 4.5/5

name: sudip mishra
title: Very nice mobile but few minor flaws
content: My father has been using this mobile since last 2 month and did not face any problem. I bought it yesterday in black colour and it feels so great to have this mobile. However, while setting up I faced 2 issues and 1 from a friend. 1- playstore was not updating or installing g new application. 2- YouTube was getting crashed.. 3- A friend of mine who bought this a month back told me that Vodafone and bsnl signals are very weak in this mobile. I fixed the above two issues after watching youtube issues and seems it is very common problem with M31 and can be fixed within 5 minutes. The one my friend faced has no solution as I had the same issue with my airtel number when I had moto g5s plus.. Overall I give this mobile 4 out of 5. Please go for it but make sure your internet provider is compatible with m31

name: Annyun Raj
title: Best phone under 20k
content: Now this a magnificent smartphone that I am holding in my hand and writing this review. If you are looking for the best camera phone with huge battery back and RAM, then look no further. The 6GB RAM galaxy m31 is the best smartphone in the market which will provide you with amazing features like 64MP primary Camera and a 32MP secondary camera. Want to see pictures ? Go on and check those amazing pictures of the River Brahmaputra, Assam. Stunning, isn't it? Want to go for a tour and record amazing videos ? Do not even worry of battery backup. The 6000 mAh battery in one single charge will be enough for you to click as many pictures a day, record videos and play games as well, forget the battery , it will be enough to last around 24 hours even after heavy use. So go on and order your Galaxy M31. And if you wish to upgrade, look no further than the newly launched galaxy m31s which has many amazing features too just at ₹19.5k. But that review is reserved for another day. Take care and stay indoors.

name: Ashish
title: Best in class and best in market
content: One of the best smart phones in the market right now, when it comes to the camera I have observed it takes awesome shots with front and back camera, and in low lighting it awesome.. With day to day usage If you play heavy games like asphalt 9, pub g mobile exsynos 9611 gives awesome performances with game booster I perfectly maintain ram and processor for optimal performance and heating issue too minimal.. Coming to battery life powered by 6000 mAH it gives best performance as of normal usage like social media, surfing taking shot, watching movie and listening to songs battery can last up to 1 and half day easily. When you do heavy gaming like pub g and all in full charge u can play 5,6 hours continuously.. Coming to online streaming and entertainment app like netflix and prime video it supports widevine L1 support as know as HD streaming or you can watch movies, series in high definition.. Now the coming to design it samsung glastic design which feel premium in hands and u water drop notch display with quad camera setup is just awesome.. Now the trade mark and the best part of samsung smart phone display 6.4 inches, 1080x2340 Full HD super AMOLED display with 83.92% screen to body ratio. It really best part of smart with color full display and out door brightness is all awesome.

name: Balado Sailo
title: Unexpected cellphone
content: After one month of using samsung M31. I have a lots of experiences.. Advantages:. 1. Camera quality is great in day light.. 2. Touch sensitivity is excellent.. 3. User interface is upto the mark.. 4. Sound quality is average and using earphone/headphone it is excellent.. 5. Charging time is fast with 6000mAh.. Disadvangtages. 1. The most important thing as we know samsung battery backup is never satisfying any user compared to other brand. It does not last a day even if the screen is not continuous light. 2.8 out of 5.. 2. Exynos 9811 (10 nm), the processor is not upto mark as it consumed huge battery which is unexpected. Also, it somtimes delay/hang phone.. 3. One major disadvantage is the signal strength. It is not getting a proper signal while other brand are using full speed on the same place.. 4. Camera is hopeless at low light.. Note: The battery and the signal strength really needs to improved and I hope the battery backup improve with system update.

name: Rajiv
title: Disappointed  with battery backup - not looks like 6000mah
content: Brought M31 128 gb variant . Phone looks great and display really nice. But battery life is not seems to be like 6000mah . For simple usage YouTube videos,online songs- battery drains fast . I was using lg w30 as temporary mobile (3000mah)I feel that mobile backup was good.. After some day will update my comments if any changes

name: Mayank.
title: Go for it.
content: Giving review after Using it for two days. Recieved the phone with 49% charge and it lasted over 7 hours with continuous use. So yes the battery is massive.. Here are some pros, some average features and some cons I experienced in two days of rigorous usage.. Pros-. 1. Superrrrr Battery- Today I charged my phone to 100% and it's been more than 4 hours of continuous use and the battery is still 75%. The Monster battery of 6000mah Is by far the USP of Galaxy M31 and the reason why I bought this smartphone.. 2. The Stunning and beautiful super Amoled Display- OMG I can't emphasize on how gorgeous the display is. After watching on this super amoled screen, every other display of laptop, TV, other phones look out dated.. 3. One UI 2.0 - the UI of M31 is amazing. It is simple yet so satisfying. This is hands down the best UI in any smartphone.. Average features-. 1. Gaming - I'm not a heavy or pro gamer but played pubg and Gareena free fire for a little while for testing. The games do take a little while to open thanks to dated exynos 9611 but there's no significant lag while playing and average players will have no issue playing Games in this smartphone. Not to mention the super amoled screen makes graphics look stunning.. 2. Camera- Both front and back camera in this smartphone are good but not 64mp or 32mp good. However The quality is amazing considering the Samsung brand name and budget price tag. On a positive note HD videos can be made in this smartphone so you can stop taking your DSLR everywhere.. 3. Also has Dolby atmos feature. I did use it while using YT music but found no difference. Maybe it requires better quality headphones to experience or is just useless.. 4. The phone does look good but fails to give premium look. Back panel is plastic instead of glass something redmi note 8 has. However I always use cover so not an issue for me.. 5. 6 GB RAM - the Ram is 6 GB yet only 3 gb is ever free. Rest of the 3 gb is gobbled up by the heavy OS and bloatware.. 6. McAfee antivirus - McAfee antivirus is preloaded but I have annual subscription of Avast ultimate so kind of useless to me.. Cons-. 1. No cover provided within the box.. 2. No headphones provided.. 3. No Samsung secure folder.. 4. Fingerprint scanner is a little bit higher. I'm currently having difficulty getting used to it.. 5. The charging pin Is wider so can't use one charger for all purposes and can't use data cable with other smartphones.. Verdict- My biggest priority while buying a budget smartphone was a Massive battery, premium display, above average Camera, average gaming and samsung brand name. And Galaxy M31 doesn't disappoint at all. It's a well spent money from my side. If your priorities are same as mine then go for it. 👍

name: Pulit Agrawal
title: great display but weak battery
content: If you are buying the phone for battery life then you are going to be disappointed as claimed 6000mah battery wont last any longer than a 5000mah redmi phone. Display is good ,video watching experiencing is nice. It gives you dolby atmos sound experience while using earphones so music experience is also good. Certain features are missing which are common inbuilt features in most of the phones like screen recording,notification light,network meter,etc although that can be achieved by installing various apps but it would then eat up your space uncessarily but being a 6/128 variant that wont be much of a issue. Camera is good

name: Amazon Customer
title: Good phone, but lot of Galaxy updates and less user-friendly camera modes
content: Pros:. Better sensitivity when compared to Redmi K20 interms of fingerprint or sensors. Better performance overall. No noticeable lag. Photo quality is good. Cons:. Fast charging takes more time than the normal Redmi phones (Around 3 hours). No document mode in Camera - makes it cumbersome to edit snaps. There is no option to turn off Data saving mode alert, even though i don't prefer the phone to show data consumed. Unnecessary notifications from Daily hunt and other galaxy Apps..very annoying (no easy way to switch of these notifications either). Also suddenly camera says "scan" instead of working on a click (difficult for Senior citizens). The Samsung headset used also picks up noise while doing recording on Apps like Smule and Star maker - no good DSP and Headset tuning seen like in Redmi or other phones which have adjustments based on headset type. I verified the same headset on multiple phones like Redmi, Vivo etc and it works well there, but picks up noise in Samsung M31

name: Anshumali
title: Phone review
content: Camera is average( its good but not good as 64mp). Earpiece is small so you have to aim it to ear otherwise you will not hear other person's voice properly. Only these two thing i didn't like otherwise phone is very good. Battery is fantastic (with normal usage it runs 3-4 days without charging but usage varies from person to person). Performance is great( i have 6gb ram 128gb internal varient). Bulid quality is also good as per price range. Smooth and fast. Display is best. Comes with latest software. Fast fingerprint. Sound quality also good. And overall i liked this phone just only the two things i mentioned above that i dont like, thats why one star less

name: Devashish S.
title: The king of its segment
content: Best buy for an average consumer for media consumption, watching youtube, and streaming services online.... The screen alone makes it worth of buying as it's way way better than the panels on its competition.. The camera quality is great and even better than the competition.. Battery life deserves a mention wherein for a heavy user, you won't be left searching for charges... it easily lasts one full work day without needing to be charged.. Fingerprint scanner could be better positioned but its fast which is great.. Gaming would be slightly compromised when compared to its competitors, but I dont think an average user would notice it, because the screen has wonderful color accuracy and contrast. Overall the best purchase in this price range.

name: Shanker
title: Go for it totally worth it !!
content: For a low budget phone this is the best you can buy battery capacity of thr device is as described great battery backup speaking about the camera quality is superb only problem is the picture quality will only be great if there is a sufficient amount of lighting in the area. Display is so smooth processor speed is so great for most functionality facial recognition works flawlessly it would have have been great if they added more face emojis for the budget you cant get more than this.

name: Noufal
title: My first Samsung phone
content: Pros:. 1.Battery 6000 mAh- good to last for 2 days with moderate use. (I am not a gamer). 2. Camera- good at day light shots(front & back). Definitely need improvement at low light conditions. Same camera performes better than this at Realme& Redmi.. 3.Display- Super Amoled- best. 4. It does not feel too heavy even though with 6000 mAh battery.. 5. Android 10- Samsung's One UI2. Latest with great GUI.. 6. Finger print sensor- fast with great response.. Cons:. 1.Exynos 9611 processor - average. Not meant for gamers.. 2. Plastic back.. 3. Charging- ~2.5 hrs to fuel the battery full. 4.Focus hunting- While recording video camera struggles to focus. You feel it only when viewed on big screens.

name: Yaswanth
title: Genuine review after 3 months use
content: First of all about the battery it's really annoying to charge it will take upto 3.5 hrs it will take more time if u use while charging I can't find any reason to buy this phone apart from amoled display which not that great.and omg that heating issue is really awkward for samsung again. The cooling system is useless for 15 min use u feel like a iron box.best to avoid this all the tech reviews are trash.it is hands-on experience. I'm not bias towards any other mobiles but this samsung mobile is waste of money. Also I have hanging issue keep in mind Samsung processors never be compared to Snapdragon in any field. Power efficiency, heating, also multiple tasks

name: Rajat Passi
title: As Advertised - The #MegaMonster
content: This is my first Samsung phone. My family and friends everybody is using Samsung from longtime, so i thought i should try Samsung now. So i ordered Samsung Galaxy M31 as it was the latest phone with better config than any other phones and also the price was reasonable as compared to others.. When i received my phone and when i started using it it was marvelous. I read the comments and reviews before purchasing and got mixed reviews about the phone. But when i started using it and noticed about the comments and reviews as given by the others, it was nothing like that. Camera is Superb and Macro feature is awesome. Battery performance is good, display is magical, slightly heating when playing games like COD Mobile, Pubg and Fortnite but it's common.. Overall, the phone is really a MegaMoster. The price is good, features are awesome, body is good, sleek design.. As per my opinion, buy this and get amazed with best quality and services by Samsung. A value for money phone.. Thanks to read this. and Thank you Samsung for giving me this amazing experience.

name: Ajay K
title: Problem wid the camera
content: The fone is awesome overall. I just hv one problem. The screen I view before clicking a picture and the one that is captured are missin 4 inches.. is this a fault? I hv used samsung fones before and never had this problem but this seems like a fault wid this specific handset. I don't kno if other m31 users have the same issue. But please look into this.

name: Gaurav pandey
title: Great product _Made in India
content: Thank you @amazon.in for delivering it real quick.. *This phone has an amazing battery life, the UI is superb and smooth.. *Performance is good if you are an average gamer but however, you can play high-end games too :P. *Does not have few bloatware or pre-installed apps, you can uninstall these apps later point of time.. *Andriod 10. *The camera is no doubt on par with its competitors but yes when it comes to low light photography you might feel a pinch..but I am sure not many of us do low light photography...however Camera performance is 8 out of 10.

name: DEEPAK J
title: 🤩🤩One and Only best budget smartphone of 2020🤩🤩
content: SAMSUNG M31 is one of the most gorgeous and elegant smartphone in 'M' series. The reason to acquire this smartphone is listed below-. 1) As samsung said, MONSTER battery 🔋. It's sufficient for more than one day😎😎.. 2) The back fingerprint sensor is extremely outstanding and excellent and better than side fingerprint sensor which is enhanced with other new smartphone🙂🙂.. 3) The phone weight is extremely light weight😉😉. It helps to use in one hand for long time... 4) Compatible to other smartphone fastcharging is very unsatisfactory. but, This 15W charging helpful to stay battery life for long period👍👍.. 5) Even though the advance processor is available in the market and Samsung proceedings with his own processor is little bit confuses me to purchase it🤯🤯🤯.. 6)The camera quality is overall best in segment.As I added some of photos in above which is more helpful than text🤩🤩🤩.. 7) The back camera design is looks terrific and fair to purchase a budget smartphone🥰🥰🥰🥰.. 8) The build quality (Plastic)is satisfactory 😎😎as compare to other brand which is made of glass and steeel🧐🧐🧐🧐.. 9) As I am a student . It was very helpful for me to get surplus knowledge through Internet.. 10)The amoled and💓💓💓 u shape display is stunning for movies..😯😯😯. 11) I had used this phone for one month and I had never feel, I had taken wrong decision to purchase this phone👍👍👍. 12) It is decent for gaming as I experienced..🙂. 🙂overall to say one and only best budget smartphone of 2020🙂

name: Amazon Customer
title: Mobile not working after April 2020 Update
content: Mobile not working after April 2020 Update. Also, there is a lockdown, when contacted customer care asking to bring to Samsung Stores. This was the wrong decision to buy this product. Also after using this product for 5 months, suddenly mobile became black screen, Went to service centre, they have mentioned that they don't have spares for M31 and it may take at least 1 month for repair. That also they have not assured. Now you please decide before you buy the same.

name: jaspreet singh
title: Good product
content: It's a good product, but after 10 days of purchase it got hanged and writing pad not working properly, I was afraid, I went to samsung store at sri ganganagar,after visit store my tension has increased when store person said we will dismantle it or will upgrade the software in next morning, I come back to home with my phone and restart the phone and luckily my problem has solved, thank to god phone is working well.

name: Farshana
title: Your a samsung lover...Dont think...you buy it
content: Finger print sensor awesome.... Battery life also good... Camera quality not satisfied to me....front camera looking awesome.... Back camera was disappointed to me..... All over good mbl on samsung..... I loved it...

name: Sachin
title: go amazon go
content: Before yesterday I was thinking that Amazon is class apart from other competitors and has best customer oriented approach but my hopes dashed after receiving an Samsung galaxy m31 phone. It has multiple issues like connectivity, battery,voice cracking,volte not working. But more harassing is that they not customers oriented but rigid process oriented. They have policy of replacement with terms and conditions which usually should never. They ask you to authenticate the issue and they need proofs. Their partner Samsung will give service to customers not amazon. Hence on day 1 you have to visit or executive will come. Please WHOEVER READING THIS PLEASE AVOID BUYING ELECTRONIC PRODUCT FROM AMAZON OR ANY OTHER they don't leave any stone unturned to harasse you. All the warranty lies with company they don't have anything to do,before selling they says they will provide bla bla bla but after delivery they simply refuse by saying sir we are the platform not responsible for anything..so avoid

name: Shradha Sinha
title: OS is ridiculous and phone is hangs very frequently.
content: Phone is hanging very frequently and it takes more than 15-20 mins to restart. Once it's stuck you won't be able to switch it off... I am very unsatisfied with this product and wanted to replace it with OnePlus.. My suggestion is do your own research on samsung's OS before thinking of it.

name: Nandu
title: Fabulous  mind blowing product just go for it if you want a really good phone in your life
content: The product is really nice Samsung has done a very good work it is affordable of price and value for money 💰 very good product that maintains the company standards and the battery life of the product is also good. Very good camera and very easy to handle is. Many of the people complain of processors but is actually rally nice. If you are very high user and plays high level games also it can handle upto a great level. Very much better 🔋. Super display and. And the main point is its prime edition. The way it gives offers is amazing. Actually I bought it on offer so I got for a less price 😅. Thank Samsung for a fabulous product. Really a good work 👏 👌. Keep it up 💯💯

name: Rao, KV
title: Mega powerhouse in hand
content: Best in size with amoled display.. Excellent delivery by Amazon within 24 hrs.. Mega powerhouse in hand.. Best in smooth processor.. With 64 mp camera, quadcore camera setup is good and macro photography is best.. No problem of overheating while using or charging.. Fast charging is good.. Totally a best phone with the price.

name: Rizwana Begum A
title: Heating while connecting to GPS in maruthi Suzuki baleno alpha
