I did everything but still issue is same. At last just waiting to visit samsung service center once situation becomes normal and government lifts restrictions.

name: saurabh
title: M31 at a glance - Be a part of samsung family . Damn surely you'll love it .
content: Every thing is quite good .. Charger with only 15 w and Battery is the only concern. As it comes with 6000mah but not behaving like that ... Its sensors is good .. providing a best graphic experience. Its amoled screen is the best feature of its .. Gaming experience too is good. Somewhere its getting a heating issue .. But in this amount range... allover its one of the best recommendable phone .. One should buy and be a part of samsung family .. u will love it .

name: Veera Sasidhar Jangam
title: Heats very soon. And very much!
content: The features are all fine. But if you use it continuously for 20 minutes, it will get heated to an unbearable extent.. I checked if there is any solution for this. The solution is to reduce brightness and use fewer number of apps.. But one buys a smartphone to use the apps!

name: Austin Vallachira
title: Nice phones with ultra hanging problems
content: The Colour was soo good. other features are nice too. But having continuous hangings and stuck at the Samsung logo after force restart it comes back to the home page.. Now some noise comes after recording through mic

name: milind moghe
title: Overall a decent mobile to buy if you can get it around 17k.
content: Very decent look. Camera quality superb. Videos clarity also superb. Hi speed operations. Can open many apps at a time without delay. Battery backup is also fine. 128 GB memory awesome. No heating issue at all.. Only few shortcomings: charger cable is quite small. They should provide a bit more lengthy cable.. 2: speaker direction is down and a single speaker only so in noisy environments sound of videos and audio is poor . U really need to concentrate on it.

name: Varun Monga
title: 50000 phone in 16000 awesome product
content: The phone is best in this price range. The battery lasts whole day with heavy gaming and YouTube videos watching. Camera quality competes with phones of higher price range. I can use 2 sims with a memory card, and the 4g network support is quite awesome. Speaker sound is also good. Samsung provides a brilliant software support and after sales services. Display is the best part in this phone. This phone's features matches those of high end phones of 50000 price range

name: vijay
title: Processor speed is low  and  bad feel
content: I purchased Samsung M31 mobile within one month it is no value money mobile , it is very slow processor i than previous mobile phone which have low value but good performance , M31 is not good performance . i want to change this mobile if amazon company give chance . i feel bad

name: Reshma
title: Don't buy anything from Amazon ..nad never trust on azon executive
content: Do not order this product..with in 2 months the product display was damaged . And now acko team denied to provide the benefit bcoz amazon cancel my acko policy order without ny confirmation and after that of executive inform me to place new order for acko policy u will get the benefit.and do that..but now they denied to provide the benefit..bcoz they are saying u not eligible to et this benefit just bcoz u order seperately.. executive so rude

name: Gigi M John
title: Great Phone.
content: It has a great battery life, great Camera and UI. The fingerprint reader is currently used for authentication only. It can be extended to answer phone calls and take selfies/pictures. Really Light, Charges fast compared to its Capacity.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best avoided. There are more reliable phones in this range.
content: The phone initially seemed great. Good feel, good battery, good camera..... but after about four months of usage, the phone has started hanging, is slow, and some apps don't open. This is despite, low usage and just 31% storage used, and updated and clean phone. Nothing seems to take care of this problem.. The phone hangs, some apps have problems. Not expected of Samsung. I have used Redmi and Lenovo phones with fewer glitches than this one.

name: Hari Sriramulu
title: Great Mobile!
content: The best phone in this price range and category! Pretty easy to setup and transfer all content from the old phone smartly! Battery back up is pretty good and the touch sensors are pretty good! Camera features are okay but not great!. Overall a good phone!

name: Ravi R
title: Don’t buy Samsung M series Phones
content: Samsung M series phones are so worst and useless phone .. don’t buy it seriously 😐.. Samsung has to make some good phone to compete Chinese company products..

name: Satish
title: "An all-rounder in this segment".
content: Camera is clear and it has different modes which are quite amazing. Macro camera is quite clear. Battery gives a backup or one and a half for moderate use. Fingerprint reader is fast enough like a blink.

name: NAGA VENKATA RAVI KIRAN G
title: Good but not up to the mark
content: Cam performance is good, at starting there is a trouble while using camera my phone has been restarted frequently I took Samsung assistance and it's resolved. Performance is good but it's not up to the mark phone is been hanging after using for a long time need to resolve it in the next update and there is no inbuilt app security heat heating issues so be there after using for a long time. Overall the performance is good

name: James Anto
title: Waste of money choose another phone.........
content: Don't buy this phone. Waste of money. Camera clarity is not good both front and back. Zooming is pathetic.finger print sensor is very slow.battery life good. Display good.overall performance is not good. I do not suggest this phone.my old phone is redmi.. Comparatively redmi is better.

name: Tarun Kumar
title: totally waste of money
content: Camera is not good in quality and sometime glitch in keyboard or in tapping on flash light or night mode button while scrolling AND THE BIG ISSUES is that battery take long time to charge .overall it is worthy according to price . Picture quality is also bad getting blur after take a shot while zooming in . Back surface is very slippy . Finger print sensor is less working . I suggest to buy POCO X2 in this price .

name: Mukesh
title: Good product but still iPhone is best
content: This is a good product from samsung. I have been using itsince a week and it's working fine. I was using iPhone before that and using android from iPhone was too difficult for me but this phone somehow worked on my expectation. Still I would recommend if your budget is good go for iPhone.

name: Nitesh vaghela
title: Issues with this model of phone.
content: This is the worst Samsung phone I ever had. I have been always a Samsung user. But this time this model of phone is very worst.. - The phone hangs each and every time,specially while typing.... - 1st it hangs and then it automatically get restart. Or sometimes it get restart without doing anything.

name: Harshdeep
title: ALL FEATURES ARE DESCRIBED IN THIS REVIEW
content: I'm IN LOVE WITH THIS DEVICE I'M USING IT SINCE FROM A MONTH THIS DEVICE IS A ALL-ROUNDER. IT TAKES APPROX 150 MINUTES TO CHARGE 100 FROM 0 BUT IT'S BATTERY IS VERY LONG LASTING IF I USE YOUTUBE IT GIVES ME NEAR 11 HOUR BACKUP AND FOR GAMING IT'S A BEAST IN THIS PRICE RANGE AND CAMERA IS ALSO VERY GOOD. MACRO,ULTRAWIDE,SUPER SLOW MOTIN,HYPERLAPSE,NIGHT MODE ARE VERY IMPRESSIVE ONLY ONE WORD FOR IT #megamonster

name: M KALIMUTHU
title: Monster ‐ Not a word.!
content: Actually I'm using this phone M31 since February 2020, I have become fan of it. I'll suggest everyone of you to go for samsung M series mobile like M21,30,30s,31,31s since of its power packed embedded system. Till date I couldn't found any problem like hanging or latencies. Fingerprint sensor response is awesome is quite fast than other mobiles in this price range. Camera is awesome with special features. Really it's a Monster as name suggests.!

name: shaik kareem raza
title: Affordable
content: Brought samsung Galaxy M31 on 27/5/2020. 1) Camera back is very nice 64 MPA,but on zooming it's not give you 64 mPa .. 2) Display is pretty cool.. 3)Almost it takes 3 hours to full charge.. 4) I don't observed it as 6000 mAh b'coz ,. Previously I have used Moto E4 plus its actually 4000 mAh charged once a day M31 is also same.. 5) On charging its getting heat.. 6) Finnaly samsung has to check the quality of battery on first.. Other wise I love to it.

name: Gowtham UNDEFEATED
title: Best Phone at its best price.
content: Everything is good, Worth for money. It has all basic and many advanced features as well. Samsung is doing best in android phones and delivering top class handsets. Camera is really awesome. C type charger is really super fast and M31 battery backup is fantastic. It would have even better if they given a headset (headset not included).

name: Tumpa Das
title: Alert! #poor service #worst model
content: I would like to bring to the knowledge of all the customers who are willcl42ing to buy this samsung m31 because of its varied features. The reality is behind the hood i.e you are provided with the lot of features along with very poor hardware parts.. It has not been more than a month. And my mobile fell just once as usual every mobile does. And the result is infront of you all. I really regret to opt this model over other long lasting and genuine brands.

name: Prasad
title: Not satisfactory
content: Unsatisfactory with the phone. Slow and some times phone getting hang. Finger sensor is not the extent very slow responsive. It is better to go for another phone we can get better phones with this money. Only advantage with this phone is battery.

name: Derik Bhardwaj
title: "The Best Phone" for the budget consumers.
content: I have always loved the Samsung UI because of its clean interface and next to no trash. As a person with a minimalistic approach towards products, the all black phone suits my purpose.. As far as the review of the phone goes, most tech review videos dont do justice to the phone. Amazing camera, long lasting battery life and a freakishly fast processor all packed into this less than 20K package is a well deserved surprise for those who wish to buy it.. By God! The display is just heavenly.

name: manish
title: Heating problems and Phone Hangs a Lot
content: Back cover is not fully fitted...there is some air puff nearby finger sensor, creating doubts if the Battery is fitted properly or not.. Sometimes facing the heating problem as well...one item (pin to open sim Tray) was missing in the box...Further after usages of 2 Months the Phone is Generating unbearable heat and most of the time the mic is not working on a Voice call as the person on other line Can't hear your voice

name: Dinesh Duraisamy
title: Samsung betrays, Amazon supports.
content: Camera is good even in low light. Gaming experience is really fantastic. While using the phone you will doubt about the RAM size. Some of the features are make you angry need an update. Battery last only for 12-14 hours , too bad. Mi note5 pro seems better than this.

name: Yogesh
title: Worst Product
content: 1.Proximity Sensors not working well. 2.If call/SMS from secondary SIM then data goes off .recove after APM. 3.Both Camera Quality is worst.. Front camera image looks like 5MP. Guys, please do not buy this product.Think 100 time before buy this product.. Replacement also not possible as 7 days replacement.Return option should be there.

name: Nilendu Saha
title: Simply awesome mobile with all round performance at a budget of Rs.15000
content: Samsung Galaxy M31 is really an awesome mobile handset at a budget of Rs.15000. Every aspect of the mobile is superb for an aveeage mobile user.. Thank you Samsung for the M series specially M31.. Thank you Amazon as well for marketing the same in India.. Keep up the good work.. All the best!

name: Sumit Mitra
title: Battery needs more improvement
content: After using it for 5/6 days Samsung M31 (compare to my last mobile Asus Pro Max M1 - 6/64 GB). 1. Performance outstanding. 2. Camera both good. Lack. 1. Battery performance not upto the mark seems 4k Battery, does not last 2 days (my last mobile Asus Max Pro M1 5k Battery last more than 2 days). Utterly disappointed.. 2. Quite heavy.. Can buy this mobile but have to charge on 1.5 day

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not so great product
content: Not a great product for the price.Battery life is good.Camera is not so great and having problem with wifi Conductivity.If you are looking for the product for good network connectivity then this is not the one for the purpose.

name: Rathin Bhar
title: Overall good phone but has overheating issue
content: Okay so this is the 2nd day of me using it. Overall the phone's good. Works fast enough. Front camera-very good, back camera- varies idk why. Battery is good. Phone's mic and speaker both are pretty good. The problem I'm facing is that the phone is getting heated up badly. I tried cooling the cpu down using some apps but it did not work.

name: Xoforia
title: Cheap quality phone with defects
content: Display is not smooth. Touch is not accurate. Battery discharges very fast, phone is on low battery most of the time despite 6000 mah battery. Quality of the phone is not good. Poor product by samsung

name: Srinivasaraghavan
title: Good for the price
content: Excellent phone for the price. Display is very good- sharp images. Front camera is good for video calls. Rear Camera quality is ok. Battery life is good. No heating issues. Charges fast

name: Rajamannar MK
title: Value for cost
content: Slim,nice colour god speed, light weight,in few seconds answering"fingerprint reader"... Morning to worry through out the day about battery.... Superb Camira.... We can do Crystal clear pic... Totally nice

name: Sandeep Purohit
title: A good phone for small budget.
content: Battery life is not that much good if you have low range and network distributions battery life is almost one day not more than that, camera is good wide view range is give better experience, fingerprints reader is unsatisfied is not that much quicker or sensitive or not easy to use because it's designe is so flat so take a lot of effort for it. Otherwise its look is better and back panel tuch filling is rich good for handling for one hand.

name: DHIRAJ JASISWAL
title: Value for Money with Samsung Galaxy M31. Sabaka Bap.
content: Amazing Phone with great configurations and user friendly features & interface. After 3 days of roughly uses I realized that Samsung is Samsung. I installed 160 Apps, Storage of 128 gb consumes 110 gb with fully consumed 32 gb SD card, still no lagging.. Really loved this Samsung Galaxy M31.. Camera 5/5.. Battery 5/5.. Design 5/5.. Processor and user interface 5/5.. Display Touch outstanding 5/5.. Really for One + users this is better option.. Boss Samsung is Super Champ.

name: santosh k
title: buy indian be indian support your country
content: after the covid 19 pandemic please stop buying all chinnese phones like Samsung one plus or redmi . go for indian make brands I have sold this phone and gone for indian brand like micromax. please support your country by buying products from indian companies . support your country

name: Harshabh Srivastava
title: Good phone with some fallbacks
content: Good phone except following gaps :. 1. Face unlock takes time and needs better light to work properly.. 2. Poor processing when multiple applications are needed.. 3. While multiple applications are being processed rapidly, phone hangs sometimes.. Rest depends on user's requirement. Review may vary based on user experience against his requirements.

name: VJN0904
title: Disappointing experience
content: Absolutely disappointed, this is the first time that I've bought a Samsung phone and I couldn't have worse experience. I often had them hanging during some important work would be going on. But what would a person do when the phone completely stops working in the middle of the night? Luckily, I was at my home. I had always known that Samsung phones have issues, but having experienced it, I can't really rely on this phone anymore, I've already put it for an exchange.

name: Sai Mahima G S
title: Worth every penny
content: It's a classic phone that offers the best anyone could ask for in this price range. Be it the built of the device or its features it is an all rounder. A phone should keep its user happy and satisfy all the needs and this one is too good in winning the users heart. Battery, display, camera, processor, memory everything is outstanding! Worth every penny! Its a true delight for budget makers!

name: Vaishali Sharma
title: Samsung M31 the mid range beast.
content: This phone is a beast. The things that could have been focused on are "Fast charging charger as the 6000 mah battery took almost 3 hours to get fully charged" & "Back cover quality which seems to be cheap". Except these this phone fares really well with this price tag.

name: A.Joseph
title: Check the proper working of the microphone
content: I bought this product last week through Amazon. The camera is of high clarity and overall it is a really good phone. But there is something wrong with the mobile's microphone. During a call I end up sounding muffled or far off to the person on the other end even if I am using an earphone. It is really turning out to be a major issue due to the high strain with which I have to speak. I am thinking about returning back the product. Plus the battery too is running out a bit fast. Other than that the product is great and handy.

name: RAJNISH K.
title: Overall phone is good but don't be attractive to camera lense
content: I am currently using IPhone 6s and bought M31 due to its camera quality shown in the description on Amazon. It has a 64MP/32MP {Rear/Front} camera however the picture quality is not very impressive rather I would say below average. So if you are planning to buy it for photography then don't go for it.. Phone's battery performance is excellent.. Display quality and touch is very smooth and responsive

name: Amazon Customer
title: Touchscreen frozen
content: The product stopped working within 4 weeks of purchase. Bought this phone for my wife, a doctor who faced inconvenience and is left without a phone at such a time! Really disappointed as a Samsung fan! Have atleast 4 Samsung phones in my family including mine. Will evaluate viable options for future use

name: ashish uniyal
title: This mobile is below average.
content: Its been more than 4 month of purchasing this phone.. 1. Bettery is drained very fast, 6000 battery is only for name.. 2. Charger slowly charge battery.. 3. Phone get hanging just after view month.. 4. Sometimes lag is seen in some apps.. 5. Screen touch problem seen in phone.. 6. Camera is not that much good in this price range.. 7. Build quality is very poor.. I recommend other brands phone, if there is negative rating i give it -10.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Excellent Phone at right price
content: I got this mobile just before lockdown. It was a real saviour for me during this crisis time working from home for office continuously. It has excellent camera , plenty of memory working flawlessly supported me while attending office meetings over phone. I just loved the Amoled display that is available at such a good price. It is now my essential part of my business.

name: Rinu Maria George
title: Value for Money
content: 2 weeks of me using it. I would recommend this phone to anyone. I am using this as an office phone. As sales, my phone is unstoppably ringinflg adding with COVID.. Still battery lasts for 1.5 days which is a real boon.. Suggest to confidently go ahead and buy this product.

name: Anshul goswami
title: Disappointed
content: Mobile is good, but if i spend 20000 for a mobile, than i expect more than good... Ram -Rom is good, but believe me i am disappointed from camera quality, its need too much daylight to click a good picture or video.. Overall camera quality is very poor... 😞😞😞😞😞😞

name: Avinash
title: Best killer phone in mid range till now
content: Finger print sensor is awesome, the quick way it unlock the phone is very satisfying.. Camara quality is way beyond expected the color of image & contrast rate is nice. Options provided in pro mode is very nice & useful, selfi Camara also playing very nice role. It is also quick in unlocking phone by face recognition.. Battery life is fo far good, I was expected battery will comes around 2 days but getting around 1.5 can't say it is bad. Optimizing the apps may give more efficiency.

name: Sasidharan
title: Samsung All_rounder
content: Good:. - Samsung brand & Android 10. - Display is Nice. - Performance at best No heating. - 6000 Mah massive battery. - 512 GB card dedicated external card slot.. - Both dedicated sim slots support LTE. - Fast charging and 15W charger. - Mobile speakers sound is good,. - Camera is really good. - Face unlock / figure-print sensor response is good.. Feedback_ Best all-rounder at budget

name: m g.
title: Good phone if all features works
content: Phone and features are excellent but if that works only. I bought this phone 1 week back and im having bluetooth connectivity issue and charging port issue after showing that in samsung service center it worked well for 1 month and again the charging port was damaged this time service center didn't help with warranty they said it is damaged so you have pay for it and if paid also it will take 10days to repair.very disappointed with service

name: NAZAR
title: Worth every penny.
content: I have been used mobile phone since 2000. I think , it is the best phone I ever used. Long lasting battery back up, superb cameras, good processor, these are the main features of this phone that fascinated me. If metal is used in back panel, it will improve the look of the phone. The main drawback is that the battery takes a long time to recharge. An awesome product. Really nice good performance. Thank so much Amazon for fast delivery.

name: Arnab Patnaik
title: #Megamonster.
content: It is one of the best mid range phone available in the market and don't know if you can get a better deal than this beauty, pretty sturdy looking and is perfect for daily use. The 64mp camera is a megastar and selfie cam just makes it perfect for attending class. 6000mah nattery runs a day and a half with no sacrifices to make. Just a lil bit slow charger otherwise it is absolutely amazing smartphone, great work by Samsung. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐.. -Arnab Patnaik

name: Sagar P S
title: Budget phone. Don't expect too much in camera
content: Budget phone. Don't expect too much in camera.. Pros:. 1. Budget wise good configuration.. 2. Screen refresh rate is good.. 3. The feature are too good like dual window, multiple screen.. Cons:. 1. Camera is not great. 64 MP photo shots - after binding it has too much noise.. 2. Macro camera shot - focus of the object is not proper ,hope there ll be software update.. 3. Battery back up - one full charge lasts for only 12hr with normal usage.

name: Regular Middle-class Online Customer
title: M31 Volume Rocker Button Issue
content: Neew M31 Received on 05-Jan-21, Volume Rocker Button has gone down inside the body today on 14-Jan-21 (9th day). Return window closed on 13-Jan-21. What to do, where to go. 16k gone?. Update: Volume Rocker Button OK on its own.. Feeling Excellent phone M31. Numerous features could not explore all.

name: Anurag Mittal
title: The best in range smartphone
content: it is the best phone I've ever bought. It is simply elegant, be its 6000 mAh battery, infinity display, 64mp quad-camera setup, and the Samsung one UI 2.0 which makes it out of the box. Its performance is best, its battery works really long, its biometrics are best, screen quality is awesome, and the camera captures almost every detail, even in the night.. Overall, the phone is packed with so many features and it comes at such a price. The phone is indeed a #mega-monster!

name: Arun Kumar
title: Heating issue
content: 1. The heating issue in following below times:-. A. During charging. B. During Game use. C. Background running App. 2. Slow charging. 3. The camera is not good enough as be expected with 64 MP. 4. Scratches come very easily on the backside.

name: Amazon Customer
title: M31 review
content: It s an awesome phone you should buy it.Camera quality is good,large battery life,good for gaming and it has a lot of feature ,it's screenshot taking style is also cool.I guess it's worth.I suggest you to go for this phone.THE MOST LIKED FEATURE OF THIS PHONE IS IF ITS GET FALL ,NO NEED TO WORRY,ITS HAS GORILLA GLASS AND ITS A STRONG PHONE.THERE IS LESS RISK OF GETTING CRACKS ON IT.GO FOR IT GUYS .

name: sandeep parab
title: Tough competent to flagship phones
content: I was thinking to buy Samsung S20 Ultra. One of my friend told me about M31 launch and i checked about the features on internet. I fell in love with M31 and decided to go for it instead of S20 and i am proud to say that my decision was correct. This is a Mega monster for sure. 64 MB camera, 6 Gb RAM, 128 Gb memory and 6000 mAH battery. Everything is same as what you expect from a flagship phone. Camera is awesome, features are superb and no comparison to the battery, it lasts for 2 days for me. Thankyou Samsung for M31 launch.

name: Rajmohan.V
title: Best Budget Phone
content: Good phone under budget.. Would give 10 stars with a Snapdragon Chip. Wonderful experience with M31. Quick fingerprint Scanner. Amazing camera in this budget. You should train yourself with this device to make use of it at its fullest.. And word "MONSTER BATTERY" in ads is really a reality.

name: Harsh Vardhan
title: Phone is nice in use
content: M31 is good as daily use and its battery backup is pretty good and its screen is owsam camera quality is okay and process is also good as per gaming it gives nice rispons and build quality is nice starry

name: mithare
title: Charger and charging problem this phn. And Amazon customer not help
content: I m take phn 15 days, battery problem and charger will be not connect it's wost products,. Item will be return or replace will be not accept the Amazon coustmers and not help helpline nom. And call be cut. Wost products will be deliveryI m take phn 15 days, battery problem and charger will be not connect it's wost products,. Item will be return or replace will be not accept the Amazon coustmers and not help helpline nom. And call be cut. Wost products will be delivery

name: Karnjeet sharma
title: Mic issue in 6 month sound not going properly
content: Good battery life phone camera is also good but i think 6GB RAM only for name just like 4 GB RAM ROM is also good. I bought Samsung m31 and on6 both are in 7 month to 8 month mic not working properly . I gone to phone repair center open my phone and Technician told display got defactive 3500 extra charged in samsung on 6 mobile, samsung m31 same issue is there i don't know what I can do . don't buy any samsung phone because 2 time I faced same problem " mic issue and mic replacement time display got damaged..

name: Jwala prasad
title: Phone tells all
content: Best phone I have ever watch it its performance is better than other phone eyxenos 9611 is best and camera quality is osm if want to buy it I recommend you to buy these phone because it is best phone at the price of 17000 rs Samsung Galaxy m31 shows that no one is better than m31 its battery backup is extremely good even I play pubg for 10 hr but it not get discharged phone is performing good in 6 GB RAM osm phone best quality and beautiful superamolid display

name: Ravi Prakash
title: Awesome mobile and worth for every penny..
content: This is amazing deal with Amazon to purchase Samsung Galaxy M31 mobile.. 1. It has super strong battery backups.. 2. Awesome display.. 3. Nice speaker and voice clarity.. 4. It has plastic back body but looks fine just like to premium.. 5. Camera awesome both.. 6. Storage capacity are huge to store maximum data.. 7. Last I would say timely delivery by Amazon but disappointed to see missing some article from mobile box such as sim ijection toll and manual guidance... But happy with the device...

name: karthik
title: Ring Volume issue, Sound issue
content: Do not buy this phone at any cost ,. I have bought this on October , with in 15 days I have received volume issue , I could not hear ring tone , I have tried everything and went to service centre. Same issue happened with many people for this phone - search volume issues for M31.. Don’t waste your money , buy some other brand phones. Completely dissatisfied with M31 phone.

name: Rajesh
title: Samsung M31
content: Wonderful product. Got very good discount from Amazon.. Completely satisfied with the product. Now the OS automatically updated to Android 11.. No heating, quad camera, 6000 mAh support 2 day medium usage without charging.. Camera quality is awsome. I got this product in 13K, Thanks Amazon for providing attractive discount.

name: Abhisek Das
title: Not Recommended
content: Within 1 month the display got damaged automatically. Submitted to service center but after 2weeks got to know that the parts are not available. So, Samsung Service Center provided coupon voucher of buying value to bought other set from dealer after another 2 weeks. Dealer said that M series model are not available, so had to bought A51.So, today I got a new set after almost 1 month. So, buy Mseries at your own risk.

name: G. Sai Rithvick
title: Worth The Price
content: Upgraded from Galaxy A30. Pros. ---> It has better camera than A30. ---> Battery life is great (6000mAh). ---> Screen is Good!. ---> It is Android 11 and One UI 3.1. ---> Even with case it is less than 220g. ---> It has a Headphone Jack. ----> I don't play any game can't say about gaming performance, but phone is fast. Cons. ----> No pair of headphones, No case no screen guard

name: Amazon Customer
title: Not bad
content: Overall mobile is working good.. Below are few concerns:. 1.Lighting cable length is not more than 1/2 meter . This is tooooo bad.. 2. No ear phones. 3. No pin but mentioned in product info

name: Vikas
title: Not as per expectations from Samsung
content: Battery life is good. Standby time is almost 3days. Using Hotspot it is having one whole day.. Bad camera. Rear cam doesn't seem to be 64MP. Having quad cam still few pics are having blur. Front cam is WORST. My previous phone oppe F5 with 16MP front cam is far better than this.. 6gb RAM.. I don't know why new phone with 6GB RAM stucks for Google home page itself SOMETIMES. Speed is also not as per expectations. Completely disappointed by the phone.

name: Abhi
title: Long Battery life , Light weight Phone.
content: I bought this phone for my mom , we use it for online classes as camera .. It has 1.5-2 days battery backup based on usage , which is great (even with gps on) . So far there has been no glitches . Pictures are great . Light weight mobile phone for 6000 mah battery . Overall satisfied with the performance of the phone .. planning to buy one more .. Cons : Body gets easily smudged . I have bought cover now . that solves the problem .

name: Soni
title: Awesome phone with good battery life
content: Overall good quality and build. UI needs more improvement for elder people. Fast charging heats the phone a bit. But its a common problem with fast charge. Have gifted to my Mom and she's happy with it. Good product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Some small bugs or problems
content: Sometimes when download an app from playstore and install it then takes more time then the new one.. Sometimes when open any app it stay on splash screen for a long time i don't know its a OS or app problem.. And also sometimes mobile data upload and download icon stuck at one side either upload or download then i'm not able to browse any thing and i have to restart the phone or flight mode on and off then i am able to browsing

name: Ashish Sharma
title: Rear Camera has issue- Dust collecting there
content: I am having issue with this phone.. Not sure how but the dust enters inside the phone and gets collected over rear main camera. Get it cleaned once and nownit started gettin collected again. The service center guy said it might be due to comestic defect. The called samsung care as well rhey suggested that next time when ut happend plz ask the service center guy to raise the same to quality team. As the dust started again will visit soon.

name: Anil Dhan
title: Great phone for the price bracket! One improvement area is the camera.
content: I bought this phone for my mother and did quite a good testing myself. I was initially confused If I should go for those realme phones due to the specs but I am glad I went with Samsung. Majorly due to the after sales service. The phone has amazing battery life, and performs smoothly. The camera could have been better. The display is the best part of this phone ! Good contrast! Also, with the special 'U' notch this phone looks top notch!

name: Rakesh kumar
title: Awesome product once you get you love it
content: Awesome product in this range and also believe in samsung... Fingerprint reader is very sensitive u definitely enjoy it for unlocking phone.once it's get 100% charged u will able to work 48 to 50 hour continuesly with internet or all kind of uses.. Camara quality is awesome too front as well as main camara also too many functions are inbuild with this phone.... In one word M31 mobile phone is awesome product by Samsung in this range..

name: Bikram Singh
title: Defected piece delivered by STPL Exclusive Online deliver.
content: I get it delivered through STPL Exclusive Online dealer. This dealer delivered me defective piece. Phone battery was dead and it never powered on. It remained switched off and as I tried to charge it there is no charging indicator and it has not changed as I changed it appropriately for half an hour. I have ordered a replacement and hoping this time I will get a right product. I hope....

name: Peeyush Verma
title: Samsung M31 Amazing phone
content: Finger print reader is amazing just unlock the phone on instant finger touch.. Battery is so powerful that it last for whole day and may use for next day also without charging. Camera is clear and sharp enough and provide high quality pics for moving objects too.. I have installed lot of other apps but mobile doesn't lag.. 5/5 for the mobile , ocean blue colour is very pleasing.

name: Nitish kumar Singh
title: Value for money for those who want Non-Chinese product
content: After using 3 months. Here is my review. Pros-. 1) selfie camera is good, rear main and wide angle camera is also good. 2) Battery backup is of 1.5 day for average uses.. 3) Display is very good. 4) Design wise and look wise, phone is good.. 5) Processor is working smoothly.. Cons-. 1) Micro camera is of no use; slow and super slow motion video recording is very bad in low light

name: Noel
title: Good product worth for this price
content: Pros : The product looks amazing.. camera is awesome.. sound is good.. product comes with gorila glass and its little bit weight which is an advantage for me.. no heating problem so far.. on the whole I just love it. Processor is fast as expected.. Good for games... Cons: battery is not fast charging as expected. Charger cable is very short . While ejecting SIM slot should be very carefull since it's very thin which may break if we push harder.

name: Girish Dodia
title: Good battery, camera, face recognization and finger scan
content: First of all, Amazon service is good. As always, product has been delivered in time even in pandemic situation. Coming to mobile, as said in specification, battery is good, running for two days. Main camera is good. Micro camera is also good. Front camera is also good, like main camera. Can be used as speaker phone with high speaker volume. Call volume is enough, with noise reduction. Overall I am satisfied with the product and service.

name: Premanshu Samanta
title: Value for money with a little disappointment about camera.
content: Best phone in this price level. Overall performances are very good except camera. Camera is far better than M30&M30S but could be a little more better. You can't use flash in 65MP and UHD resolution doesn't support video features. Apart from these..camera is fine. Nice shots can be made easily with this one. Battery is the best part of the phone. No lag noticed in 4 days of use. Sometimes heats up a little.. but it's negligible heating.

name: Ramesh
title: I wont recommend this mobile
content: Touch screen stopped working in less than 3 weeks and when I visit service center (Faridabad NIT), They take for review and make some break to glass as there was no mark even before that and not ready to replace with glass, They are now charging 4600/ rs for this.. DO NOT BUY this production , especially disappointing with there services in Faridabad area.

name: Reena Rane
title: Great phone from samsung
content: Such a nice phone from Samsung. As I am supporting make in India project and even looking for good mid range non Chinese phone 📱 and somehow I purchased this phone. Giving review after near about 15 days all things are as per the description given on the page but according to me back camera is not as per the quality of 64 mp

name: anil bali
title: Worst Samsung
content: I have used a good number of phones but never it happened that a new phone i got is not working in the very first hour of its purchase.. i received a new Samsung M31 today and tried use it. To my dismay i find that the touch is not working properly. Is this quality Control at Samsung?. It is unfortunate to have such an experience.

name: Prabhat
title: Great Phone with best camera in segment
content: Battery life is good for heavy users it can go upto a Day.. Camera quality is good enough.Video recording is also great.. I am not a gamer so can't review over it but can say that lags are not there.. Phone looks premium but the back panel is made of plastic which attracts finger prints so a back cover is must.

name: Anshu
title: Very poor battery life.. draining like anything
content: Phone heat up while charging and calling/taking a call.Also, fast charging not working even after fast charging features ON.. Battery life is very poor, battery draining off very fast.. very poor experience.. using this phone since mid July 2020.

name: AKHILESH
title: Over all gud budget phone
content: Good phone from Samsung family nice battery backup a decent camera set up overall worth for the price I had a little issue with the mic mic is not not reading low voices and calling I think it's a little defect just fine I just leave it...

name: Raj
title: Nice product as expected from Samsung
content: Again Samsung proved themselves. Camera, touch and battery are awesome. Fingerprint sensors are also working very smooth. However, fingerprint sensor can be slightly need to improve with the design.

name: Sumeet
title: Not as per my expectation.
content: Pros:. The camera is really good, Huge 128 GB internal memory support well, fast processing and look is good.. Cons:. Heating issue- Continous usage and charging time, It has 6000mah battery but still back up is less, multi-app operation- sometimes close some app automatically.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Worth the money
content: Compared to earlier Samsung products, this one is absolutely worth the money.. Battery life, charging time, display, camera are awesome. 128 GB storage is also very good.. The best part is the price. We would have bought a phone with half these features last year!

name: Jootoor Manjunath
title: Wifi and mobile data has issues
content: Junk phone having lot of troubles with wifi and mobile data.... Forcing me yo restat every time.. Mobile says connected to wifi, if I try to make call or msg over what's app it does not go

name: Narsing More
title: Good option for Non-chinese midrange phone
content: Samsung M31 is decent deal, if you don't want Chinese brands.... Pros: battery life. Display. Add free ui. Camera in daylight. Cons: Processer. Camera in night time. 15 W charger take 2.5 hr to charge. Wifi connection poor. Network connectivity poor. Back is of plastic.... Finally, either you want samsung brand or Nonchinese brand, you can go for it... But after price hike it's kinda overpriced...

name: SREEKUMAR M.
title: Great
content: Super item.Fingerprint is working great than other phones. One tap would open the set. Battery life is immersive. It last so long than I expected. It is good in camera 64 mp is actually working nice. Absolutely the phone is a great product by the samsung. I have been using it for 3 month . I don't feel anything bad about this phone right to this time. This is absolutely a great phone. Thank you samsung and Amazon for giving this great assistant to my life.

name: Manjunath
title: Best in Class with power packed features & performance
content: I have always been a loyal customer with Samsung since 2004. I had just started thinking of switching "BRANDS" this time. On my lookout, i came across Samsung Galaxy M31 and did a detailed comparison with other competitive brands & found Samsung Galaxy M31 to be far more superior than the rest. This was justified with my purchase. So far no complaints...... Pro's: One day delivery, Best Battery life, Rear Camera is excellent, Front Camera is good, Finger print & Face Unlock has quick response.. Con's: NIL so far

name: Ashish
title: The Phone Hangs Sometimes
content: Screenshot stopped working.. The phone restarts automatically sometimes.. The phone also hangs sometimes when you click a picture using front camera.. It was working fine for the first 3 months, this weird behavior started later.

name: Suvajit Mandal
title: Cool Samsung Phone
content: TUsing Samsung after a long time. The navigation and UI is feather touch. As of now super fast with long battery life. Good value for money given the various discounts during Diwali. I would recommend to go for it without doubt.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Average battery life, pretty good camera quality
content: Battery life is average, nothing very special about the 6000mah battery. I find the camera quality very well though. There are some network issues with the phone sometimes.

name: Devaraju
title: Worst and third class camera
content: Third class camera.. Doesn't feel like 64 MP camera at all. When captured and zoomed in, all images are noisy and blurred. No clarity. And front camera is also the same. Its not 32MP, it is just 2MP camera.. Don't buy this phone. Returning for replacement or refund.. Guys just zoom in the both the images and see how the clarity is.

name: Siva
title: Great Mobile
content: It's look is awesome. Performance is superb. The Internet is ON all day long, but still the battery drains slowly. Battery is truly long lasting. Internal Memory space 124GB is more than sufficient for any one. External SD card gives still more memory space.. More importantly, unlike my previous Samsung mobile (J7 only one SIM works on 4G) both SIM cards work on 4G.

name: Purohit Vivek
title: Awesome
content: I have found my order in very systematic way and as i like the amazon services from the beginning of my online shopping.. I like the packaging, delivery timelines & quick responsive behaviour of delivery boy.. Samsung galaxy M 31 is very good phone as I have purchased it for my wife and she likes it very much. Thanks amazon for the great offer for valuable product.

name: Jai
title: A Good phone
content: Value for money . Couldn't have found a better phone in this budget . Works quickly at your command , its super fast . The camera quality is superb it definitely makes you look better . Very easy to operate . Didnt have difficulty switching to the new phone by using samsung switch . The touch is also very smooth . I charge it in 2 days time despite making lots of calls and listening music via bluetooth and using social media as well . The battery life is phenomenal .

name: Swasthika
title: Worth Product Samsung M31
content: Really worth for money, make your choice non-chinese mobile with perfect quality, camera quality is quite good and samsung M series with mega monster, 6000mAh Battery also lift this phone in to a new high.. Really worth and performance is awesome and samsung brand is worth at all.. While we are comparing to other mobile in this budget, this mobile wins.. Game boosters and Battery optimization increases the performance of the mobile.

name: Prakash Sharma
title: Best midrange phone from Samsung
content: It is one of the best camera phone in this price range from Samsung with a monster batter and a great AMOLED screen. I'm using this phone from last 3 months now and i didn't face any problem yet. You can through any game on medium to high graphic setting with good frame rate without any problem and yes it feel premium in hands and it's not that heavy either even with 6000mah battery but 15W charger took time to fully charge your phone.

name: Sougata Nandi
title: Poor camera. Software problem.
content: Camera quality is not as expected. Pictures under proper indoor lighting are also blurry. 64MP camera is useless. Doesn't support HDR, Zoom, flash. These drawbacks shall be mentioned clearly. Feeling cheated.. Has software problem even with brand new phone. Google Chrome is not getting updated. It fails.. Fingerprint sensor works fine but slow.. No support for screen recording. Even taking screenshot is pain.

name: A.T.Reddy.
title: Good phone, average camera, good battery
content: Good phone in thia price with amazon prime free for 3 months.. Battery is good but camera is not upto mark.. Clicks avetage photos and videos also not that good.. If u are looking for a camera phone, dont biy but of u want an excellent smartphone in low price samsung os the only brand with such price.

name: Akhila
title: Awesome budget phone
content: Fingerprint reader is very good within just a second u can unlock the screen,as coming to the battery it really good just after charging a full of 100 percent it can last for a very long time.. When coming to the camera it is just superb u can capture so much of detail using the awesome quad camera,with 64,8,5,5 megapixel cameras u can get an awesome clarity pictures .. The night mode is working just awsome.This mobile really pays off its worth.All around performer in every aspect.

name: Pinaki
title: Review of M31,128GB
content: Crisp display, long battery life, awesome camera are amongst the pros of this product. Touchscreen works so smoothly..... However, a bit faster fingerprint sensor or on screen fingerprint sensor may take this product to the next level.. I don't have any lagging or hanging issues till now, works very fine with me. But incorporation of much modern processor is further appreciable.

name: Santha kumar
title: Battery drain fast
content: I bought this mobile 14th march. After 2 days battery drain very fast. 5 hours of usage battery drains 55%. Samsung please solve the battery draining issue in next update quickly. Camera super. Display vera level. 0-100% charge full in 2.5to 3 hrs. Blue colour very nice. Fingerprint sensor too fast

name: Mrityunjay Kumar
title: The best one in the given price tag by a trusted brand..
content: The phone is very good. I am using from last 10 days and the performance is all satisfied. Two things Samsung should work on..1st. If they have given so powerful battery then they have to provide strong charger too cause to charge this much powerful battery, it tools more time by the given charger. 2nd. Fingerprint reader should be more reliable as per my expectation.. Except these two, everything is best at these given price range.

name: Amlan Mishra
title: Mid Range Killer : Bad start but great experience later on
content: It was a bad start to be honest . The phone heated up uncontrollably . But after resetting it and not using it overnight, it really helped . If anyone is facing the same issue do try it . Overall it's a killer phone in this range . With all the specs mentioned it kills competition hands down . Go for it without any doubt . The battery and performance won't disappoint u at all .

name: Abhijit Banerjee
title: Don't buy it. Waste of money....
content: Camera is good. Battery life is also good but it takes 3 hour to full charge by 15watt charger.. Overall this phone is made by very cheap quality products. I bought it 8th June, 2020 I recieved it 15th June. After 58 days of usage the mid night black color of back side is turned into fade black. And the back side camera glass broke in 3rd day in pocket. And these are out of warranty. So this phone is made by very cheap quality products. Rs.17,000 is not a joke.

name: Aquib Ahmad
title: I don't write reviews but It made me to write.
content: Worst phone, Camera isn't good both rear and front even other phones 8 MP camera is best than this.. Battery isn't good it's taking too much time to charge and not even last upto 1 day.. Fingerprint isn't working fast.. Facelock taking a lot of time to unlock.. Super Amoled display just a trap.. Nothing is good in this phone.. Samsung is just looting us bcoz of it's name.

name: SK MD Khaleel
title: Excellent phone for mid range price
content: Samsung M31 Performance is excellent and fingerprint sensor works perfect with dedicated slot. Single shot feature is an amazing option when you want to capture multiple moments in single click.

name: Shouvik Saha
title: Great Package if you are looking for a brand
content: Awesome Display....5* just for the Display.Not a gamer though maybe that's why I am perfectly okay with the performance....battery is okayish I would say doesn't perform like 6000mah ...camera is meh! Seriously doesn't feel like 64 mp...photos in daylights are above average but boy it completely fails at night....feels like Samsung put a good display along with some cheap hardware in a package in the name of fancy title

name: Tanvi Desai
title: Awesome, Must buy
content: Excellent phone. Very good battery life, takes time to charge but battery once charged stays for a long time. Fingerprint reader is a bit problem may not identify it everytime. Camera is Awesome. Loved this phone👍👍 Samsung M31 is budget friendly as well as quality wise greatt phone. The only thing is if you are shifting from OPPO or VIVO to samsung some operations maybe a bit confusing.

name: Phillmon
title: M31! A good budget phone
content: The phone's pretty good ...battery backup is epic. And the display is really good compared to the other phones in the same price range. And I exchanged my vivo v9 which I bought it for 25k. But I got this phone for 15999 which very cheap and has a lot of cool features which my old phone didn't have. And battery lasts for nearly two days which is actually really good. I love the performance. And the fingerprint scanner. is also quite good

name: Kartik Garg
title: Truly Monster :)
content: This phone is a mind blowing purchase I've made this year.. Even after 5 months of regular use, the performance is truly monstrous and I'm really more than satisfied with this phone.. Maybe this gadget is the best that one could find and afford this year.. If you are planning to buy a samsung M31, I'll recommend you to straight away go for it.. ThankYou Samsung for a wonderful gadget.

name: Faiz Muhammed
title: Great Battery life , and camera quality and worth the price.
content: Just like WOW. Samsung is all time favorite brand. and can buy this phone with no doubts. Because with this low price they give you great experience.. And also i can tell you about fingerprint reader. Phone unlock within split seconds. Battery (6000mah): you can ensure 2 days battery life. And especially camera so good, great quality , with 4 cameras. If you are a movie person you must buy it, because they give you AMOLED Display.

name: Kaushik
title: Great phone for medium range price.
content: Nice phone, long lasting battery, decent display and decent camera performance. For a price of 16,500 it is a good deal. I am sure there will be reduction in price in future. Happy with the phone. It was delivered in just two days with a proper and secure packaging. Couldn’t ask for more.

name: Dabooree
title: M31 'THE GREAT #MEGA_MONSTER.'
content: I have been using samsung galaxy M31 since April 2020. In this couple of months no issue/problem is facing in this device. Smoothness of the device makes me happy, any other device can't beat its battery life,fast fingerprint reader and its 64MP camera resolution. One can feel the real color of Super AMOLED also. Samsung galaxy M31 is not a MEGA MONSTER only, it is THE GREAT MEGA MONSTER. I really love ''MEGA PIXEL OF MEGA MONSTER.''

name: Sonali Sharma
title: A must buy within 20K
content: I am having a great experience with my Samsung galaxy M31. I bought space black 6GB/64GB variant. Following things I like about this phone. Pros. 1. Amazing display as usual that is super amoled.. 2. Nice camera, it'll serve the purpose.. 3. Sleek design. 4. Cost justifies with the quality it gives.. 5. Battery life is really amazing, one full charge will serve your purpose for almost 2 days on normal use.. Cons. 1. Little heavier

name: darshan d
title: 👌🏻Value for money
content: Good for the price.But there’s no headset in the box as mentioned in the site of product information ,n later found out it’s not provided by the company itself so kindly remove it for further confusion/trouble/loss.

name: Harsh
title: One of the best phone by samsung.
content: One of the best series from samsung.. M31 is really monster phone. I can compare with samsung flagship series. samsung is providing all features of s series and note series.i prefer to buy M series. One of the best feature I like in samsung is single take ( camera ) and performance and battery life is amazing. Blazing fast fingerprint and display quality is too Amazing.. My whole family use samsung phone .

name: Dr. Sunil Deshmukh
title: Good but need much upgradations
content: Mobile is good, but having lot of cons... Following changes should be made..... in built App lock, second space WhatsApp with unlimited contact capacity (currently 1000 only ), screen shot method is quite difficult, imperfect, no dual app for twitter, should provide back cover, home screen amazon app should replace google window, notification light on display, contact at call log shoud have option for WhatsApp msg, .....n many more

name: Jiji Joseph
title: Value for Money♥️
content: The first best thing about M31 is its beautiful Amoled display.The ONE UI 2.0 also feels premium and refined compared to that of other competitors.The battery at 6000mah lasts you for days and lets you live tension free.The fingerprint sensor is snappy.The quad rear cameras have great HDR and the 32MP front camera is also great under good lighting conditions.The perfomance of Exynos 9611 is good for normal everyday tasks.

name: Mrudula
title: Not worth of price
content: Honestly Mi and Oppo mobile has better operating system than this mobile.... I've purchased 10k Mi mobile for my mother last year and compare to this mobile where I pay 17k the Mi mobile is wayyy better.... very disappointed 😔

name: Vineet Rana
title: Best
content: I purchased this phone on Amazon sale and I got additional cash discount of Rs1500 by using my HDFC Credit card. I got this phone at Rs 15000. Amazon delivered this phone within one day. Quality of Samsung M31 is really good at this price. I earlier used Samsung A series phone so if I compare picture quality of both then I think A series is better but in this price range M31 is really a good option to buy instead of any Chinese phone.

name: Ashish Sharma
title: VFM "Smart" Smartphone
content: Now using M31 since 6 weeks. Delivery and packaging perfect. Set up was smooth and so was data transfer from the old Samsung phone. Impressed with battery which lasts almost two days atleast as of now. Pictures from the camera are sharp. Finding no lag in operating the phone across functions. Fingerprint reader is quick. Overall find the phone very good and a real value for money proposition...

name: Premnath
title: M31 review
content: Display and touch response is good. Overall phone looks okey, but the 6000mHA battery is not upto the mark. On general use battery last max 24hrs (Without gaming). The Fast charge word is just fancy and in reality no significant difference found between normal and fast charge. Not worried on camera & fingerprint quality.. Would be great if samsung response back to user on battery as it won't look like 6KmHa. Worried that whether should we need to replace battery after an year.

name: Dr.Padarabinda Shadangi
title: Samsung m31 its a powerhouse and real mega monster.
content: 1st thing this is a good mobile with repuated brand,and its made in india tag also with 64mp quad,8mp ultra wide,5mp macro,5 mp depth and 32 mp front camera to capture the beauty of life which is excellent.display and performance with android 10 is superb,mobile weight is ok and speaker sound is very good.and its battery life is is very good with fast charging with 15 watt charger.really its good a power house and real mega monster

name: Ravi Teja
title: Worst smartphone ever
content: I am writing this reviews after using 2 weeks i observe that Finger print and face unlock sensors are little slow, Gaming is fine with medium Grafic quality, camera quality is ultimate bt in slow motion the quality is little bit less.. After using 4 weeks. This mobile has connectivity issue, as mobile data suddenly stops and it will frustate us.. all of sudden mobile ring tone playes with out any call.. Never ever buy this..

name: Amazon Customer
title: Heating issue no proper support from Amazon customer service
content: This phone has heating issue .. Amazon refund and return option is removed ... Amazon customer support agents also not helping for refund or replace.. customer have a right to return the low quality products.. If this continue, Amazon and Samsung market will go down very soon in India.

name: AVINASH
title: I like samsung now
content: It's my first time I purchased any samsung mobile... It's really better thAn MI, OPPO, VIVO. Special:- CAMERA, BATTERY, ANIMATION BECAUSE OF UI, SCREEN AMOLED, EVERYTHING FINE ACCORDING TO PRICE. NEED TO IMPROVE:- NEED TO PUT IN DISPLAY FINGERPRINT, SNAPDRAGON PROCESSOR. OVERALL PHONE IS SUPERB..... CAN PLAY PUBG IN HDR.... I can suggest to my friends too

name: Vivek Pandey
title: Great battery life and display, but a bit heating
content: So far so good.. Pros:. 1. Battery life is amazing. 1.5 days to 2 days of battery life with high to medium usage respectively.. 2. Camera is decent. Both rear and front.. 3. Display is great.. 4. Phone has decent looks. Cons:. 1. Slight heating while gaming for half an hour. 2. Samsung keyboard hangs at times. 3. UI is not as friendly as MI. E.g. taking a screenshot is pain.. 4. Face defection is okayish. Overall it's a decent phone in this range.

name: bala
title: Very Bad Screen Touch. It doesn't work
content: I bought it on 28th June 2020. Using since then. Touch screen is very very bad. It doesn't work well. As of now four to five time it became non-functional for some time (an hour, two hours) then started again after restarting the phone. Today on 31st July, I tried to restart by pressing side key and restart option. It's not working. I have attached video also. Requesting amazon to replace the piece immediately.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review in myself
content: I bought 26.12.2020. I have used 10days 1st time in my experience amazon delivery is worst... this item outer baking opened... i asked delivery man but he's no responsed... Samsung mobile m31 prime overall is very good... photo clarity good..battery is excellent.. one think browsing speed is not good compared mi note, yes it's very slow, yes mi note series is best compared Samsung m series

name: Sarang saru
title: Nice
content: Finger print is fast battery is so good and also camera

name: Rajesh kalal
title: Not value for money product
content: The handset quality is very low constant hanging issue lags often. Also the battery is not performing to the expected standard. Handset reboots of its own accord while using and gets stuck at the booting screen. Even with the fast charger provided with the device charging takes too long upto 3hours while the battery life is no more than 12-15 hours with moderate usage.. I want to get my money back, no replacement I want refund for this.

name: Binoy Majumder
title: Very Poor Network
content: I purchased this mobile on 16 May 2020, but now I feel to return it to Samsung. Very Poor network. I compared with Xiomi Redme Note 3, with same Simcard. Note3 has no problem but Samsung Galaxy M31 very very Poor network. I ask the authority to refund the money if possible. Thanking you.

name: Pawan Y.
title: All over Its Brand is that I love and Thanks for Delivery...
content: I have used this Samsung m31 for 7 days after this phone Camera quality is Good And fingerprint is also good, But the battery is good but not adequate and drain little bit fast only but it's used for 2days long last, but go for it and U will see new Era of Samsung galaxy M31 Quality.....

name: Joseph George
title: I like it's cameras the most
content: I was looking for a high resolution front facing camera to take selfie videos. After a long research through many reviews from many sources I finally decided to buy this phone. It's both front and rear cameras are simply awesome! Other features are also good in this price range.

name: Vikas
title: A Good Buy
content: After using different models of Vivo phones from past few years it's very difficult to adjust with this phone. Not user friendly. UI is not good as expected. Camera and battery is good. Face recognition is worst. Fingerprint works but not fast. But still good buy and value for money at this price.

name: Nandagopal C.
title: Good buy for the price
content: Excellent buy for the price range. Good AMOLED and Full HD display. Fingerprint sensor response is quick. 6000 mAh battery with the fast charger support makes the battery reliable and powerful. Front and the rear camera quality is also pretty good. Amazon delivered the product promptly and well packaged. Unlike my previous experiences with Samsung Galaxy series, this one's a better experience.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Poor touch screen functionality
content: Quite disappointed with the product, though I had very bad experience with Samsung 10 years before, over a period of time I thought there must be some quality addition. Recently I purchased this mobile and I find no difference. The touch screen functionality is very poor. I find it quite difficult to type, but thought of any way putting this comment here, so at least of you may not get cheated

name: Amazon Customer
title: value for money
content: good phone in this Price rang.. camera captures good photos at day and night in boths lights.. design is impressive.. performance is very good. even supporting Ultra HD graphics games. like Pubg... not. heating while using too much.. battry is awesome.. and some review was that 15 watt charger is taking too much time to charge full battry of this phone.. but seriously i feel that charging speed is fast and too good.. go for it if you want all rounder phone.

name: Gajanan
title: Samsung fan for life time.
content: As always Samsung gives you much more what you paid for.. 1-Ergonomic of this phone is really good l.. 2-The battery life is reliable. 3-Screen resolution meets the requirement of phone user. 4-Gaming experience was good.. 5-Picture quality n video quality is also good.

name: Andy Tripathy
title: Do not buy Samsung phone. It has network issue and call drops
content: Call drops is big issue. formatted and reset phone many times but no help. My sim is working good in older phone but Samsung M31 is worse. I have to step out of house to take calls. wastage of time. Biggest wastage is samsung customer support. no intelligence. they just read script to you. No repalcement from Samsung. It is totally crappy.. Guys do google and check, Samsung M31 has calling and network issues. Life is hell.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Best phone in this price range.
content: Have been using this mobile over 14 days. Its one of the best phones i have used so far. Battery, camera, superamoled display are main features the phone is offering, for me its sar value and its weight management add to it. It has its own limitation in night camera and heavy gaming, i dont mind them as its offering way more than many others in this price range.. Fully satisfied with this product and also has to appreciate fast delivery from amazon team.

name: Nitin
title: It's just okay device.
content: 1. First time user of samsung smartphone and must tell you camera is good.. 2. Defaults apps too many and disappointed.. 3. No split screen.. 4. Limited gestures.. 5. High battery consumption when not actively used.

name: Megh
title: Good phone in this price range
content: All features are good, speed of operation is good. But camera quality is not as mentioned, 64mp photos look like 8mp photos. If you are buying for camera, than its not that good. Zooming of camera is very poor quality.

name: Parasuram
title: VALUE FOR MONEY . Samsung Again... Thank u Samsung
content: Its an amazing device in this price range. Esp Display and Camera.its too good. BATTERY life is Perfect. Compared wth A50 s..little bit bulky ... android 10 buttery smooth...processor.ram.memory..even the sise is same as of M30 S. (Chk gsmarena comparison). But the 64 mp camera did the Magic..Thank U Samsung and Amazon.

name: Aqib
title: Worth the money.
content: Have been using this device for the past two months. The main highlight is the battery life, it lasts more than one day even with very heavy usage. The camera is great in outdoor lighting but in indoor lighting the photos are just average. While in low light the photos are very disappointing. Finger print sensor is fast and detects most of the time. Also, the Super Amoled display is fantastic, the colours look great. For the price point, this is a great phone.

name: galahadm
title: Had to take it to a dealer as it did not work out of the box.
content: Picture quality on first use was terrible but was quickly rectified by local dealer. Maybe the phone should be setup for the highest quality and shipped so end user can change if required and not that it is setup so as to be required to be taken to a dealer to have it rectified. Not impressed however the phone is of good quality and performance.

name: Amrita S
title: worth buying
content: I am reviewing it after approx 1 month of using it... First comes to it look..which is very smart..my one is blue... Then comes to battery life which is great..deserve 5 star. Fingerprint sensor is good... But for rear camera quality I am giving 4 star. Till the date I am not facing any kind of problem... So..I love it..

name: Ishaan
title: Worth the price
content: This a perfect option in the midrange section. Highly optimized than any other phone in this price segment maybe the finger print sensor could be improved compared to my previous phone i.e redmi note 7 pro m31 faces issues when ur finger is slightly moist. Other than that no issues at all

name: Bishnu
title: Worth buying  under 17k
content: A phone worth for buying under 17k. After using for more than one month phone is smooth like day 1. 6000 mAh battery backup is very smooth. If you're are a Samsung phone user I don't need to tell you how good Samsung phone camera are. Fingerprints is fast. Best part is it's a One UI packed phone, which gives you a bloatfree user experience. And yeah Glossy back feels classy!!

name: Amol Jagtap
title: Samsung Galaxy M31 - Awesome Phone, so value for money
content: I bought this phone after researching many options. I have been finding the mobile device very efficient and worthy. The fingerprint reader, battery life is awesome... I charge it 95% by 9am and the battery last till next day 11am. I wanted something like this before. * camera quality I'd again plus point in this phone.. 64mp output is awesome.. In short, the Samsung Galaxy M31 is awesome phone.. From my side I give 10/10.

name: Venu kumar
title: Poor finishing of edges and poor quality of back pannel.
content: Awesome product. Reached expectations.. but I can't give 5stars for the poor finishing and cheap quality back pannel, and poor indentation at fingerprint spot which leads to confusion ... coming to camera quality its siperb

name: Ashwin
title: Definitely recommend!
content: On screen fingerprint sensor is better! At this price rage Camera quality is awesome! You can't ask for more. Battery life is wow! The only downside is charging takes too long, because Battery capacity is mammoth. Samsung should have given a faster version of charger! All in all money worth spent.

name: Uphaar Prasad
title: A balanced cell phone.
content: Value for money product by Samsung. Battery life is good, so is camera and screen quality. Although the macro camera isn't that good, also super slow mo and slow mo videos lack in quality when taken indoors, but allover it's a good and balanced set. However, I might suggest that if you're interested in purchasing this set go for the 'Ocean Blue' back colour as the black one looks very tacky and I feel that Samsung should've provided glass back at this price...

name: Nishant chauhan
title: Best Smartphone in this price range(all rounder)
content: I bought it fews days back(6gb128) and i must say that Samsung M31 is a delight. Absolutely worth it. I am in love with the sAmoled display, i dont get tired watching it whole day superb touch with a huge battery life, there are so many features in this phone and i dont have to say anything about its camera as you can see the pictures and also the processor is so smooth i have been playing pubg COD asphalt9 AO and Fifa and i am literally addicted to this smart phone.

name: Abhi
title: Awesome mobile in this prize range..
content: This mobile is awesome......no heating problem any game play like pubg etc... Build quality excellent.. Design good....

name: Fekadu
title: Camera and design
content: What I liked most from Samsung Galaxy M31 (Space Black, 6GB RAM, 128GB Storage) is smartness of the design and camera quality. Most of the time i travel around world and take pictures as a memory of the place i visited and in think this product is helps me a lot in this regard. In addition, I am using the product to store important data and provide fast response to emails wherever I am. Thank you Amazon for delivering such product.

name: Amazon Customer
title: Review on M31
content: I got this phone for my mom.she liked it very much.. Finger print sensor is good .. Battery life is very good as I dint find any battery heatup or slowness till now.. Camera quality is awesome even in night light.. One thing I find is slow motion video can be little better as I can see some blurness. Over all,I am happy with the phone:). You will get all things in this phone at this rate.So go for it.😊😊😊

name: Anukool
title: GOOD PRODUCT IN BUDGET RANGE
content: FOR CAMERA > YOU CAN TAKE PROFFESSIONAL PHOTOS FROM QUAD CAMERA (WIDE ANGLE IMAGES MIND BLOWING). FOR BATTERY > AFTER USING APPX 20 DAYS I REALIZED THAT BATTERY BACKUP IS GOOD IF YOU USE YOUR WIFI OR DATA ALL TIME , PLAYING GAMES, WATCHING MOVIES, VIDEOS, YOUR BATTERY WILL LAST FOR TWO DAYS 48 HRS EASILY.. SCREEN QUALITY > LOOKS FANTASTIC, S AMOLED DISPLAY YOU CAN FEEL EASILY. PROCESSOR> GOOD GAMING EXPERIENCE IN PUBG

name: Abijith T A
title: Reallly a mega monster
content: Best phone ever from Samsung in this price range, Samsung has shown that their cameras are the best at any price range, a very great job with the battery, a reasonable processor for a phone priced at this range and with their awesome sAMOLED screen it's reallly a monster #megamonster. The best part is 64mp beast camera for high quality pictures and 4k videos and also a decent night mode with a 6000mah mega battery what else do you need in a phone. #smoothaf with their AMOLED screen with the latest android 10

name: Wiselin Bright
title: Got Broken
content: Handle with care...If You fall down this mobile display will be break into pieces..my mobile was fell down from from 2 feet height and now I am using this phone with broken display.... This is due to less durable Amoled display..

name: WISHWJEET KUMAR
title: Best budget phone
content: Pros-. - sAMOLED. - 64MP camera (great image quality). - 2 days battery backup. Cons-. - cheap plastic body. - charging speed is very low

name: SANDEEP PANDEY
title: Excellent Mobile- Value for Money Item
content: Overall Samsung M 31 is value for money. It is matching my expectations. The performance is quite good, look is excellent. The best thing is its battery life. Whole day my phone remains active either on call or WhatsApp, and many a times Video Conferencing through Microsoft Teams or other activities. Before leaving office I charge it 100% and that's all for the day. Finger print and face reader works perfectly for security purpose.

name: Ashwin
title: Awesome Smartphone at this price with all amazing features...just go for it...
content: SAMSUNG Galaxy M31 is an amazing smartphone with all the features you would ask for... The battery is too good and works for longer time along with fast charging option. The looks of this phone is very good and stylish. I am impressed with camera both rear and front...amazing quality.. The overall performance is very good and I suggest you should go for the 6 GB Ram and 128 GB storage. This phone offers value for money and the comfort you are looking for... :-)

name: N SUDHAKAR
title: An excellent device for a budget price.
content: The screen is very responsive, an excellent good battery, and a very good camera. In the photograph its dark in the other room, but the camera has used the light from the other room to take a good photograph in the night. The pixel density as well the sound quality is very good. At this budget price it is an excellent phone.. Fingerprint reader has not been used by me so far, so not commenting on it.

name: Amazon Customer
title: It's a genuine review
content: I got M31 four days ago. I used it and I want to share following things. 1. Battery - everyday 5 hours of zoom classes, 7 hours of mobile hotspot 4g connection for two devices. Mobile is worked for 38 hours with battery charge drop to 11% . This is so good . No need of power bank🙂. 2. Camera - This alone shall capture images of professional quality.. 3. Fingerprint ‐ compared with other Samsung mobiles this is by far better.

name: Satish
title: Bit satisfied
content: Fingerprint: it isn't fast and ask to cover the sensor completely to unlock. Camera : the cam shows saturated colour when compared to normal but the clarity is good. Battery: I didn't feel that massive 6000mah battery is providing massive on screen time and charger provide with it takes a quite long time of 2 and half hours approx to charge. DISPLAY: its awesome. And its giving a lag with in 3 weeks of purchase🙄🙄

name: Rajneesh
title: Bestpricebestphonesamsungrocks
content: Best camera phone, element look , touch screen very soft touch,battery life superb, voice quality very nice, display is nice , 4 camera looking like iPhone, selfie camera nice , price is also reasonable

name: S.PRASANTH K.
title: My Favorite Android Phone with flexible Price.
content: Its a very beautiful designed phone, Very comfortable to carrying and the fingerprint reader is perfect and triple camara is very fine quality and expecially the battery and the life is too long and the price is very comfortable and the quality is very highclass and its suitable for all aged peoples so I am advising to go for buy M31 branted by SAMSUNG.

name: Shivam Garg
title: Battery back up is very powerful
content: I have purchased this phone for battery back up requirement and camera. I am fully satisfied with my choice. The battery back up is very good. I can use my phone for about 1-2 hours only after getting it charged for 5-10 minutes if the battery is fully discharged. Most interesting thing I got to know after purchasing of this phone, the pic editing options of this phone. A normal click pic can be converted in to a professional click pic. Screen is very smooth.

name: Deepudas Mahanta
title: SAMSUNG- THE MONSTER PRODUCT
content: You are the crush of mine dear.. The all qualities(battery standby duration, camera quality, gaming capability etc etc etc) I want from a smartphone,. is in it.. It's an amazing smartphone after boycott china mobiles.. I wish all to buy Samsung products as these products have long lasting, shining, gorgeous and all facilities that you're thinking. #believe. Just awesome thank you Samsung.. You are my crush forever.

name: Vijay Kumar Thangellapali
title: Good product
content: Looking elegant and working well. I like it. Since I bought it recently I cannot answer about battery life. Camera is great. I am using it for video conference. Video quality is good. So much storage and happy about this mobile.

name: deepak kumar
title: Samsung you are losing your reputation
content: Although the box seal is intact but inside plastic pack phone is full of dust. Also there is curved band i.e. phone is not straight along the length.

name: Ashwani Jha
title: A budget phone which fulfill all need performance, battery and camera.
content: Overall build quality of phone is good.Performance of camera is just outstanding. But large battery power sustain only one day. Yes I want to mention one thing that I used to do average 2 hr video call and more average 3 hr internet surfing or youtube video streaming apart from regular call. So I am satisfied with its battery performance also. As I need to put it on charge at night only. And battery will never drain out whole day, if it is fully charged.

name: Amarendra Kumar
title: Value for money...
content: Phone is good and got value for money... The features which made me purchase this were a. Battery 6000 mAh, b. 6GB and 128 GB in this price range... I use mobile as mobile not as camera or farming station ... I am happy with the phone...

name: Abinash mohanty
title: Camera and battery performance not adequate
content: purchased this phone by seeing 64 MP for camera usage but M31 was the worst phone with camera quality.. Front camera is 8 and back camera was 16 MP not more that that.. there is no return option only replacement(Good game was playing by samsung &Amazon) please dont buy this mobile and dont waste your money... Heating problem while charging.. etc i am really very frustrated with this phone quality.. i lost my money by buying this phone

name: Deepak kadam
title: Battery Draining fast
content: Battery draining so fast , i am using only whats app & mails , 10 am its 100% fully charged & 04.14 pm showing 11% only.. i dont know whats going on exactly.. front camera side also getting heat when using whats app.. both camera clarity is not good,. kindly do the needful.

name: Ashutosh Tomar
title: A replacement of note 9 pro max
content: It's a very good product. camara quality, battery life , friger print reader are also good. As a saggession company must check the software carefully before delivery , sometimes it needs a full system updates when we are going to use it and during that we may think that product is not good. So check carefully. Overall it is very good product and must buy I recommend it as a replacement of note 9 pro and note 9 pro max

name: AJAY PANJARI
